proposals.title: Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural
proposals.description:
# Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural

# Nouns IRL World Art Tour - NYC Mural

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/fJ9nndG.png)
_(Microsoft Surface Mural, Jasper Wong)_

## TL;DR
Let‚Äôs bring Nouns to the world through a global art tour starting with Nouns IRL in NYC! This activation will take place during NFT NYC (June 20 ‚Äì 23) and will feature:
- Hand painted mural by Jasper Wong who is an artist and founder of Worldwide Walls (http://www.powwowworldwide.com/ 3), the mural will be viewable from June 20 ‚Äì July 10 and will feature Nouns in all their glory.
- Simple website / landing page to commemorate the mural

**The activation is estimated to generate ~1.7M impressions. The total amount being requested is 72.5 ETH.**

## Why Should You Care? 
We can all agree that art is a pretty powerful communicator; it appeals to our emotions, forces us to think, and does a pretty good job of bringing us together on some level. We hope to use this power to accomplish the following: 
- Increase awareness of Nouns at NFT NYC‚Äîonline and IRL
- Increase brand awareness of the Nouns DAO as a leader in the industry;
- Invite NFT enthusiasts and the public at large to become involved with the Nouns DAO community. We want to let people know that we are here and we invite them to come build the future with us; and,
- Create a website (nounsirl.live) that tells the story behind the art (plan is to also include art from other cities on the tour)
  - High-res images and time lapse video of the mural, artist‚Äôs explanation etc.
  - Links to Nouns website, twitter, discord, etc.  

## Nouns IRL ‚Äî Person, Place, Thing
Nouns: person, place, thing‚Ä¶ We thought that it would be really cool to bring this concept to IRL via fun and engaging art activations around the world. Each stop on the tour will feature a specific artist (or group of artists), a city, and an interesting Nounified art piece. Imagine Nouns on Venice Beach, or Nouns on a rehabilitated basketball court in Chicago. Imagine the looks on people‚Äôs faces if a huge inflated Noun floated by them in Miami. These art activations will vary in flight time from several weeks to several months, with the goal being to create longer lasting pieces that become a part of the cultural backdrop in the city. There are a ton of things we can explore on this tour and we think NFT NYC would be a perfect place to start. 

## Person
Jasper Wong, founder of [Worldwide Walls](https://www.instagram.com/powwowworldwide/?hl=en).

Jasper Wong is an artist, illustrator, curator and art director; his art style can be described as a unique clash of Asian-influenced pop culture on paper. Jasper has exhibited worldwide in places such as Japan, California, France, London, Mexico, New York, Hong Kong, Chicago, and Australia. Jasper is also extremely accomplished having been chosen as one of the HB100, a list of Hypebeast‚Äôs 100 most influential figures in the industry, which includes the likes of Kaws, Pharrell, Banksy, Jay Z and Kanye West.

Jasper is a big fan of Nouns, he has been following the project for some time and is very excited at the opportunity to get involved with the DAO. In addition to painting the mural, Jasper will be sending out Nouns-related messages on his social media platforms to engage his followers before and during the mural‚Äôs flight time. Jasper is also very well known within the art community and will attempt to leverage his network to invite some of his artist friends to hang out with him at the completed mural during NFT NYC. The goal will be to use both Jasper and his artist friends‚Äô followers to generate additional traffic at the mural and further amplify social media impressions.

Jasper is very involved with the community through his non-profit organisation Pow! Wow! of which he is the creator and lead director. Pow! Wow! is a group of contemporary artists committed to community enrichment through the creation of art outreach programs, educational programs, and engaging the community in the creation and appreciation of art. Pow! Wow! has executed projects (murals, school renovations, basketball courts, etc.) in 13 cities around the globe, such as Honolulu, Taipei, Tokyo, Nepal, Guam, Seoul, Israel, and others. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/Gd2UFLO.jpg)
_(Jasper Wong)_

## Place
New York City during NFT NYC, the Super Bowl of NFT conferences.

NFT NYC is the perfect staging ground for the first Nouns IRL activation. One of the stated missions of the DAO is to attract builders/creatives who are ready to create products that proliferate the Nouns brand to a wider audience and shed positive light on the concept of DAOs. NFT/crypto enthusiasts attending NFT NYC are a perfect target for this mission as many are informed about the space and are also builders/creatives looking for a project to support. The general public present in New York at this time will be surrounded by a ton of NFT related themes which should generate interest and curiosity. Many of these people (who may also be builders/creatives) have not yet fully explored the crypto space, this will be an opportunity to capture their attention and encourage them to become involved with Nouns DAO.

## Thing
Sharable hand painted mural art piece promoting Nouns and a simple website.

We have encouraged Jasper to create a mural in his style that is a conversational piece. The mural will act as an introduction to the crypto space for many newcomers, we hope that it inspires a sense of curiosity and an urge to dig deeper. For the more experienced, the mural will act as an introduction to Nouns; we hope that it shows them the many possibilities of being involved with the DAO. The overall goal is to create a compelling piece which introduces Nouns to the viewer and inspires the viewer to get involved. 

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/HKKgICa.png)

The mural will be located at 300 W Broadway (next to the entrance of the Soho Grand Hotel, facing the busy Holland Tunnel) and will measure 8‚Äô9‚Äù H x 16‚Äô W in size.

As mentioned above, the ultimate goal is to launch a continued effort to promote Nouns worldwide through art. NYC is the first stop of the tour. The Nouns IRL website will act as an artefact for this and all future activations. The website will contain high-res images, time lapse video, artist bio, story behind the art, and links to the discord, the main Nouns website, discourse, etc. 

## Budget (all figures are in USD):
- Mural Wall: $36,000.00:
We have been advised by the wall company that a soft hold will be placed on the mural location for us at least until the 10th of June.
- Artist: $40,000.00
- Team: $25,000.00
- Nouns IRL Landing page + capturing of video and photos for social: $11,000.00
- Travel / Accommodations: $6,000.00

**Total: $118,000.00, total ETH ask: 72.5 ETH**
_Based on ~$1,700.00 price of ETH as of June 3, 2022; we have added ~3 additional ETH to try and account for volatility and fees._

## Team
This activation is being executed by the [Nouns Collective](https://twitter.com/Nounscollectiv3) (formerly the Collective DAO) which is a liquid super team made up of friends building playful, useful, and beautiful products and experiences with the crypto communities they love. We have previously contributed to the community via the [Nouns iOS app](https://www.nounsapp.wtf/) (proposal 6) which was officially launched on May 16, 2022. The Nouns Collective is composed of experienced founders, brand builders, and developers with over 15 years of experience building successful products. 

For this activation we have teamed up with [@miss_singh](https://twitter.com/Miss_Singh) who is a creative professional, cultural connector, community builder, experiential expert, and entrepreneur. @miss_singh has over two decades of experience that spans industries from tech, marketing, fashion and retail with her most recent gig being with Shopify. @miss_singh is extremely excited to jump into the Web3 world with us and looks to use her considerable experience and talents to deliver a memorable and lasting experience.

## To be Nountinued‚Ä¶

We are super excited to merge Nouns with IRL. The Nouns community is strong and vibrant; we hope to show the world who we are and what we are about. The best way to onboard more individuals, especially builders, into the space is to meet them where they are. DAOs, NFTs, blockchains, this can all be difficult to grasp for newcomers. Using familiar / traditional mediums of delivery (pop-ups, art, events, etc.) to introduce these concepts are an effective way to drive engagement. We hope that this stop on the tour will be the first of many to come!

![N|Solid](https://i.imgur.com/9upXNjf.png)
_(Uniqlo Mural, Jasper Wong)_

votes.reason: support pursuing an engagement with this artist with less time constraints and longer mural lifetime
This is cool but I feel like it's a bit much for what we may be getting back. We are getting much more visibility with dota and that was less than 1/3 of the cost of this.

Appreciate the intention behind this prop. I am not sold on the value proposition of spending the requested ETH here on an ephemeral piece slated to EOL by July 10. Landing pages should be substantially more affordable, too. The team looks solid, but I am struggling with the short-lived value add here (relative to cost).

have gone back and forth on this one a number of times, but ultimately going to vote against because i think the long-tail risk of outsiders perceiving the dao as careless with its resources is greater than the long-tail opportunity cost of voting down this proposal. if the artist were more prominent, i would be willing to overlook the high overhead from the team, and if the overhead were lower, i would be more willing to fund a less prominent artist. the prototype sketch also demonstrated a relatively superficial level of engagement with the project. would support working with the artist under different circumstances and less time pressure.

Brennen said it best so ill echo that: 

"I think IRL activations are fairly important to start building a real brand outside of just crypto folks. Not to convert or do even get them to ever visit a website. It's really just to see the noggles and be like "hey that was cool" so when they see them again we start to build this consistent identity. These plays help us build long term brand value."

Not an easy decision, but agree with some of the other comments that the ROI doesn't seem great. And just generally seems underwhelming, given the cost and comparison to other proposals. On the other hand, I'm not thrilled with voting against this proposal because, while I don't want to spend recklessly, I'm in favor of not being too restrictive with spending. However, would prefer to spend more on novel, creative ideas that spread the Nouns meme.
Sharks like all passionate artists working on Nouns ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®

While I appreciate the changes made from feedback given I‚Äôm still not sold on the ROI given the short time frame it will be up and the mural‚Äôs website deliverable. Also the statement that he ‚Äúwill attempt to leverage his network to invite some of his artist friends to hang out with him at the completed mural‚Äù doesn‚Äôt seem to mean much. No knock on the artist or proposer, that‚Äôs just my feelings based off other art-related props & grants we‚Äôve seen that have had clearer value adds and/or were more cost-effective.

I think the team is great and the execution would be of high quality, but the lifespan of the mural just doesn‚Äôt quite seem worth the time and funds requested for allocation. That being said, I‚Äôd vote strongly in favor of a longer term mural in a high-traffic area.

Attracting world class artists and IRL noun manifestations is very important. Plus more nounish stuff at nft.nyc is valuable. A bit pricey yes. Next time I hope we have a themed prop.house for nft.nyc and other events so we make this more competitive.

votes.reason:
We believe this lawsuit is a serious deterrent to legitimate  crypto innovation, and several of us have personally donated to this cause. 

Generally we think the DAO should only engage in philanthropy when the efforts of the collective are more impactful than efforts of the individual. 

That may indeed be the case here, but we believe more discussion is needed to address points brought up by fellow DAO members.
Dont know enough about this to confidently take a side
I do not understand the legal nuances involved here and what impact they may have going forward and thus cannot, in good faith, vote in one direction or another.
We don't feel nuanced enough on the legal details to make a decision to contribute so much ETH to this cause.

Ultimately, Nouncil was not able to reach a consensus on this Prop so we are voting to Abstain. After the majority vote to Abstain (16), all other votes cast were against (12.) Overall, in discussions, we felt that there are too many unknowns/unclear items WRT the case. Even if the Plaintiffs' motivations could be politically motivated, it seems PT may have indeed broken some lottery and/or banking laws in NY, or at least, it is far from a sure thing that they didn't. Moreover, it was mentioned that this should probably have been a planned-for eventuality for such a protocol (to be sued by the State) and Nouncil worries about the precedent of deploying Nouns treasury to fund this kind of predictable legal battle (hat tip Wag.) On top of the above, this was also not a small ask (which might have found broader support.) We wish PoolTogether the best with this case, but we couldn't vote to support this Proposal at this time.
Do not carry the proper knowledge on this matter to confidently vote yes or no.

proposals.title: Allocate Noun to Lil Nouns DAO - "treasure quest" edition
proposals.description:
# Allocate Noun to Lil Nouns DAO - "treasure quest" edition

**modified to reduce token approval surface area**

Replaces Proposal 76: https://nouns.wtf/vote/76

Instead of directly allocating Noun#253 to the Lil Nouns DAO treasury, create an on-chain offer only fillable by Lil Nouns treasury.

Lil Nouns will have to successfully pass a governance proposal of their own to accept this offer.

offer price: 4.2069 ETH

votes.reason: lossy.eth
Voting against; In favor of setting the precedent that DAO-to-DAO Noun transactions happen at FMV

It seems that the reason we're discussing gifting a noun to an extension project, which is unprecedented (we never discussed a gift nor discount to sharkdao, goop, etc), is that we were allocated 10% of future NFT supply (a new thing that Lil Nouns did). I'm voting AGAINST since I'm opposed to sending a signal to present and future nouns extensions that we value receiving NFT supply allocation in a special way.

Receiving someone else's NFTs is kind of a headache. We're suddenly put into the position of having to make asset owner decisions (should we hold or sell) and in some cases such as this one we might have added governance responsibilities as well (e.g. have 10% responsibility of lil nouns' future). So unless we have some easy DAO level consensus on regularly selling the newly received NFTs, we're likely looking at the duties of holding onto an illiquid asset while incurring more DAO governance overhead. One might say that if we start receiving a lot of NFTs this way then some might really pop and have liquid markets and we might be able to experience some real ETH treasury gains through it. But if we really believed in that then we could have always bought new noun extension NFTs as pure investors with our ETH. I believe we have yet to do that because we don't think ourselves as NFT investors (even if the scope is limited to nouns extensions) and don't think that is where we create the most value from our attention. 

An arrangement that we'd much rather prefer than being gifted NFT supply is a nouns extension buying Nouns with their treasury. In this arrangement, we get ETH and likely some governance participation as well, both things that we really like and no added responsibilities that we don't like. 

I'm not saying that we should be stingy or completely self centered in a short term way. I think Lil Nouns is a brilliant experiment and love that we're for example spinning up a lil nouns prop house and sending ETH their way to help bootstrap builders there, etc. I just think that rewarding NFT supply gifting over other acts such as buying nouns or participating in our governance (which both sharkdao and goop have done) sends the wrong message that is against our incentives. We want extensions to buy Nouns, submit proposals, and participate in our governance! Giving us assets for free can be nice but comparatively is meh.
see prop 82

Nouncil <3 Lil Nouns

We prefer Prop 82 with a sale price based on FMV.
trying to reach 42-69

proposals.title: Fia World Rally Championship √ó Nouns
proposals.description:
# Fia World Rally Championship √ó Nouns


Posting this proposal on behalf of DonJon#2860
Additional Details / Screenshots [on Discourse](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/fia-world-rally-championship-x-nouns/1007)

# Sponsor a 3 car team for the Fia World Rally Championships

*This year, June the 24th-27th,the sixth leg of the World Rally Championship will be going down in Kenya. The event is the highest discipline of rallying governed by FIA.*

*Being a native of Kenya, I decided to take into my care a team of 3 drivers both of who have extensive experience and have boasted great results in the rallies they have participated in. Mr Andrew Muiruri, the lead driver, who started his career under the FIA young stars and his co-driver Mr.Edward, one of the most experienced rally drivers in the Southern hemisphere, boasting over 51 podium finishes over a period of over 10 years ,by sponsoring them with 3 stock cars for modification,and to get them registration to be able to participate in the World Rally Championship.*

[![Fia](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/044a29041eb3f76db7e423bd85fc93b1c9823b00.jpeg)](https://www.fia.com/events/world-rally-championship/season-2022/2022-world-rally-championship)

# Proposal
*I am proposing that my racing team partner with the Nouns in the World Rally Championship Safari Rally that is scheduled for the 24th of June. The initial ask is a one-time off cost and the rally team will be able to participate in future events (upto 20 events) for the next three years thereabout for almost a tenth or less of the current ask. (aprx 8-12 ETH)*

# Benefits

*This will be the first time any NFT project has participated in Rally sports, more so the biggest Rally event in the world, generating lots of publicity from people in and out of the Crypto fraternity. The same event last year generated 832 million impressions world-wide, from streaming sites(Red Bull TV, WRC+).*

*‚Ä¢Nounified branding of team race cars and gear.
‚Ä¢Registration costs paid to the WRC.
‚Ä¢Servicing the cars to the performance and safety standards required by FIA.
‚Ä¢Multiple ad work and promotion during and before the event.
‚Ä¢Mechanical and car service.
‚Ä¢Filming personnel.
‚Ä¢Travel and accommodation expenses for the racing team
Event Mechanics personnel.
‚Ä¢Spare parts.*


[![Stephan.L of Citroen wrecked his rally car in Poland, which his mechanics fixed completely in less than 30 min.](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/8a0a1dd79f8daa3ea56e95199a2f7bc6eeebb81f.jpeg)


## Media & Coverage
*The event will be broadcasted on more than 30 live sports channels in over 50 countries all over the world. The Kenyan leg of the rally garnered 832 million impressions, putting up higher numbers than the Super Bowl and the Champions League. Streaming services such as Red Bull TV and WRC+ will also stream the event live.*

## WRC Rally Car
*WRC Rally cars are built to the standards stipulated in the FIA WRC Sporting Regulations Handbook. All participating Rally Cars are inspected by FIA, the governing body,to make sure they are up to safety and performance standards to the letter.*

*Like all competition cars, a rally car features a roll cage, upgraded suspension and a strong braking system. In order to pound rough roads at high speeds, however, they require sturdier parts.
Beefier engine mounts ensure the block won‚Äôt shake loose on bumpier road sections, while a thick aluminium skid plate prevents sharp rocks from lacerating an otherwise vulnerable oil pan. Meanwhile, bespoke wheels and tyres are essential for dealing with varied, challenging terrain.*

*Today‚Äôs WRC cars are built to the specification set by the international motorsports governing body the FIA.In 2011, rules for WRC cars became more restrictive. Cars were smaller models and exotic materials such as titanium, magnesium and composite were forbidden expect when present in the base model. Initially, gear changes had to be made with a mechanical system, so the use of paddle shifters was not allowed, however this was reversed in 2015.*

*In 2017, manufacturers were given more freedom to maximise aerodynamic performance, while the turbo restrictor diameter was increased from 33 mm to 36 mm, increasing the engine‚Äôs power output from 310 bhp to 380 bhp.*


## Promotion and Nounified Onsite Clothing & Accessories
*During the course of the Rally all members of Team Nouns will be donning some form of nounified apparel. The Rally driver‚Äôs and their co-drivers, the mechanics and the engineers (Service team) will wear noun safari hats or baseball hats to shield themselves from the scorching African sun.
The team will also be supplied with nounified towels to use after completing each leg. Any sort of supplies will also be carried around the site in nounified duffels. We plan to give away loads of t-shirts and umbrellas to willing spectators. Hoodies will be worn by the team throughout their stay in and out of venue*

## Outdoor Advertising
*There will be a total of 3 ads bearing Nouns DAO selected media. One billboard, one vide adboard and a projection mapping on the Kenya International Conference Centre*

[![Ad1](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/ff6b265c6355db6c1464d7e5257135b873b8740d.jpeg)

[![Ad2](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/1X/1054a7bdfd1de50a4134a85f1c78c3b1d30ab4ae.jpeg)


# Funding Request: 153 ETH
**Pool 1: 150 ETH (50 ETH per Rally Car x3)**
Cost of Vehicular upgrades - 15 ETH per car
Racing Gear - 5 ETH per car
Safety Equipment - 10 ETH per car
Service team equipments - 10 ETH per car
Spare Parts - 10 ETH per car
[**A comprehensive and detailed breakdown of Pool 1 allocation is linked here.**](https://1drv.ms/w/s!AjtoTcl4akPtc3_sHE6lnP13jEU)

**Pool 2: Sponsored by an external Sponsor**
Used to cater for the cost of hiring engineers,mechanics, fuel differentuals, registration costs and event fees.
[**A comprehensive and detailed breakdown of Pool 2 allocation is linked here.**](https://1drv.ms/w/s!AjtoTcl4akPtd3yjyKfOShmsHes)

**Pool 3: 3 ETH**
Accomodation for the nouns team
Travelling expenses
Promotion
Media
Advertisment coverage.
[**A comprehensive and detailed breakdown of Pool 3 allocation is linked here.**](https://1drv.ms/w/s!AjtoTcl4akPteQDVMzB5b-Xrwx4)

*I plan to make a small grants request to compensate the artists responsible for the designing of the car wrap,racing suits and helmets and ads*

*The team received external sponsorship of 40 ETH that will be deposited into Pool 2 (22 ETH) and the remainder covering part of Pool 3 (Originally 21 ETH now down to 3 ETH)*


**Transaction Details:**
```
tx1: 153E to 0x6fbcB02a48505d396ceD4ACE46bf69754C72f197 (prop funding)
tx2: 0.5E to apenoun.eth (prop coordination)
```

votes.reason: really disappointed in you, apenoun

On Nouncil call, we had a fruitful discussion about this proposal and overall some Nouncillors familiar with the sport indicated that it felt like a big investment to make in the sport when perhaps more exposure could be gotten, even within this sport, by sponsoring events etc, rather than an entire team/season. The concern was also voiced that the DAO owning the cars could be a cost/liability after the season (storage, etc.) Overall, we like the energy and the proposal was well written, but the majority voted No this time. We really like Don and his energy and hope he will stick around and build more within Nouns. Kudos to him for seeking lots of discussion on Discourse and holding open calls in the discord to take feedback. We should encourage this kind of builder to stick around. Dom, please build something Nounish, even if it's small, so that we can invite you to join Nouncil!
I think the rally car sponsorship is really awesome ideally, but the bang for the buck seems really low :(

proposals.title: Gamify fundraising for Ukraine by donating 51 ETH through the Rescue Toadz project
proposals.description:
# Gamify fundraising for Ukraine by donating 51 ETH through the Rescue Toadz project


## Summary
The goal is to donate 51 ETH for humanitarian aid to Ukraine and increase the popularity of the Rescue Toadz (https://rescuetoadz.xyz/) charity project so that more people start donating as well.

## Methodology
Rescue Toadz is a charity project that gamifies the fundraising process. It is an NFT collection of 18 toadz with 100% of the funds being donated to Ukraine via Unchain Ukraine. A special bidding mechanic encourages people to donate more.

The gamified aspect is that you can not only mint toadz, but also transfer someone else‚Äôs toad in your wallet by matching or increasing their last donation. The toad then drops its noun glasses as POAP in the wallet of the original holder.

This mechanism is coded directly in the smart contract and a toad owner cannot prevent the toad from hopping into another wallet. This encourages people to donate more - if they want to keep their toad they need to increase the price of the donation or acquire back the toad if somebody donated more.

100% of the funds are immediately sent from the Rescue Toadz smart contract to Unchain Ukraine. It is a pure charity project - the project devs make no money from it.

## Why not donate directly to Unchain?
The idea is not only for Nouns DAO to donate, but also to encourage other people to donate as well. For example, NounsDAO will donate for already minted toadz and ‚Äústeal‚Äù them from the previous owners. Some of them will then donate again to get their toad back.

The goal of the proposal is to donate 0.2 ETH for 5 toadz that are already minted and ‚Äústeal‚Äù them from the previous owners and also raise the prices for two other toadz to 10 ETH and 40 ETH respectively.

## Conclusion
Donating 51 ETH through the Rescue Toadz project has the following benefits:

Funds raised by NounsDAO to help Ukrainian people recover from the war
Raised popularity of the Rescue Toadz charity project, so more people start donating
People that had their Rescue Toad taken from them are incentivized to get it back by donating again.
Recue Toadz or Noun Glasses NFTs collected by the NounsDAO
Raised popularity of the iconic Nouns Glasses, which are dropped as POAP for everybody that participated

votes.reason:
I believe that the definition of definition is reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself.

Completely.

When I was young I had no sense of myself. All I was, was a product of all the fear and humiliation I suffered. Fear of my parents. The humiliation of teachers calling me ‚Äúgarbage can‚Äù and telling me I‚Äôd be mowing lawns for a living. And the very real terror of my fellow students. I was threatened and beaten up for the color of my skin and my size. I was skinny and clumsy, and when others would tease me I didn‚Äôt run home crying, wondering why.

I knew all too well. I was there to be antagonized. In sports I was laughed at. A spaz. I was pretty good at boxing but only because the rage that filled my every waking moment made me wild and unpredictable. I fought with some strange fury. The other boys thought I was crazy.

I hated myself all the time.

As stupid at it seems now, I wanted to talk like them, dress like them, carry myself with the ease of knowing that I wasn‚Äôt going to get pounded in the hallway between classes. Years passed and I learned to keep it all inside. I only talked to a few boys in my grade. Other losers. Some of them are to this day the greatest people I have ever known. Hang out with a guy who has had his head flushed down a toilet a few times, treat him with respect, and you‚Äôll find a faithful friend forever. But even with friends, school sucked. Teachers gave me hard time.

I didn‚Äôt think much of them either.

Then came Mr. Pepperman, my advisor. He was a powerfully built Vietnam veteran, and he was scary. No one ever talked out of turn in his class. Once one kid did and Mr. P. lifted him off the ground and pinned him to the black board. Mr. P. could see that I was in bad shape, and one Friday in October he asked me if I had ever worked out with weights. I told him no.

He told me that I was going to take some
of the money that I had saved and buy a hundred pound set of weights at Sears. As I left his office, I started to think of things I would say to him on Monday when he asked about the weights that I was not going to buy. Still, it made me feel special. My father never really got that close to caring. On Saturday I bought the weights, but I couldn‚Äôt even drag them to my mom‚Äôs car. An attendant laughed at me as he put them on a dolly.

Monday came and I was called into Mr. P.‚Äôs office after school. He said that he was going to show me how to work out. He was going to put me on a program and start hitting me in the solar plexus in the hallway when I wasn‚Äôt looking. When I could take the punch we would know that we were getting somewhere. At no time
was I to look at myself in the mirror or tell anyone at school what I was doing. In the gym he showed me ten basic exercises. I paid more attention than I ever did in any of my classes. I didn‚Äôt want to blow it. I went home that night and started right in.

Weeks passed, and every once in a while Mr. P. would give me a shot and drop me in the hallway, sending my books flying. The other students didn‚Äôt know what to think. More weeks passed, and I was steadily adding new weights to the bar. I could sense the power inside my body growing. I could feel it.

Right before Christmas break I was walking to class, and from out of nowhere Mr. Pepperman appeared and gave me a shot in the chest. I laughed and kept going. He said I could look at myself now. I got home and ran to the bathroom and pulled off my shirt. I saw a body, not just the shell that housed my stomach and my heart. My biceps bulged. My chest had definition. I felt strong. It was the first time I can remember having a sense of myself. I had done something and no one could ever take it away.

You couldn‚Äôt say s‚Äìt to me.

It took me years to fully appreciate the value of the lessons I have learned from the Iron. I used to think that it was my adversary, that I was trying to lift that which does not want to be lifted. I was wrong. When the Iron doesn‚Äôt want to come off the mat, it‚Äôs the kindest thing it can do for you. If it flew up and went through the ceiling, it wouldn‚Äôt teach you anything. That‚Äôs the way the Iron talks to you. It tells you that the material you work with is that which you will come to resemble.

That which you work against will always work against you.

It wasn‚Äôt until my late twenties that I learned that by working out I had given myself a great gift. I learned that nothing good comes without work and a certain amount of pain. When I finish a set that leaves me shaking, I know more about myself. When something gets bad, I know it can‚Äôt be as bad as that workout.

I used to fight the pain, but recently this became clear to me: pain is not my enemy; it is my call to greatness. But when dealing with the Iron, one must be careful to interpret the pain correctly. Most injuries involving the Iron come from ego. I once spent a few weeks lifting weight that my body wasn‚Äôt ready for and spent a few months not picking up anything heavier than a fork. Try to lift what you‚Äôre not prepared to and the Iron will teach you a little lesson in restraint and self-control.

I have never met a truly strong person who didn‚Äôt have self-respect. I think a lot of inwardly and outwardly directed contempt passes itself off as self-respect: the idea of raising yourself by stepping on someone‚Äôs shoulders instead of doing it yourself. When I see guys working out for cosmetic reasons, I see vanity exposing them in the worst way, as cartoon characters, billboards for imbalance and insecurity. Strength reveals itself through character. It is the difference between bouncers who get off strong-arming people and Mr. Pepperman.

Muscle mass does not always equal strength. Strength is kindness and sensitivity. Strength is understanding that your power is both physical and emotional. That it comes from the body and the mind. And the heart.

Yukio Mishima said that he could not entertain the idea of romance if he was not strong. Romance is such a strong and overwhelming passion, a weakened body cannot sustain it for long. I have some of my most romantic thoughts when I am with the Iron. Once I was in love with a woman. I thought about her the most when the pain from a workout was racing through my body.

Everything in me wanted her. So much so that sex was only a fraction of my total desire. It was the single most intense love I have ever felt, but she lived far away and I didn‚Äôt see her very often. Working out was a healthy way of dealing with the loneliness. To this day, when I work out I usually listen to ballads.

I prefer to work out alone.

It enables me to concentrate on the lessons that the Iron has for me. Learning about what you‚Äôre made of is always time well spent, and I have found no better teacher. The Iron had taught me
how to live. Life is capable of driving you out of your mind. The way it all comes down these days, it‚Äôs some kind of miracle if you‚Äôre not insane. People have become separated from their bodies. They are no longer whole.

I see them move from their offices to their cars and on to their suburban homes. They stress out constantly, they lose sleep, they eat badly. And they behave badly. Their egos run wild; they become motivated by that which will eventually give them a massive stroke. They need the Iron Mind.

Through the years, I have combined meditation, action, and the Iron into a single strength. I believe that when the body is strong, the mind thinks strong thoughts. Time spent away from the Iron makes my mind degenerate. I wallow in a thick depression. My body shuts down my mind.

The Iron is the best antidepressant I have ever found. There is no better way to fight weakness than with strength. Once the mind and body have been awakened to their true potential, it‚Äôs impossible to turn back.

The Iron never lies to you. You can walk outside and listen to all kinds of talk, get told that you‚Äôre a god or a total bastard. The Iron will always kick you the real deal. The Iron is the great reference point, the all-knowing perspective giver. Always there like a beacon in the pitch black. I have found the Iron to be my greatest friend. It never freaks out on me, never runs. Friends may come and go. But two hundred pounds is always two hundred pounds.

proposals.title: Nouns House 1 - Tokyo, Jpn
proposals.description:
# Nouns House #1 - Tokyo, Jpn

## **v3 updated on 11/05/2023**

This proposal serves as an alternative to Proposal Candidate¬†**["Nouns House DAO"](https://nouns.wtf/candidates/0x1bde33dbc5c2ac7109c4a7ecf0d0a0a6cd6f57cc--nouns-house-dao)**, offering a¬†**phased approach to establishing a new Nounish subDAO called Nouns House DAO**. It outlines the first steps which includes creating the first Nouns House and mobile app. As a second step, we plan to submit follow-up proposal by Feburary 2024 to transfer initial funding to the DAO treasury followed by successful execution of this proposal.

**We have already established the Nouns House DAO multi-sig¬†[treasury](https://etherscan.io/address/0x0BC7181dc3863932F9b375bC348fe4A421B8003A), and all of the funding from this and future proposal will be going to the treasury.**

***

## TL;DR

Hello! I am¬†**[tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth)**, co-founder of Enabler DAO (**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/enabler.fun/)**,¬†**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/enablerofficial)**,¬†**[Website](https://enablerdao.com/)**). Our decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) focuses on gathering, utilizing, managing, and improving idle assets like unused houses and cars within communities worldwide. My fellow co-founder at Enabler DAO,¬†**[yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth)**, is a holder of¬†**[Noun 312](https://nouns.wtf/noun/312)**, and we believe in the power and potential of NounsDAO just as you do.

We are proposing a funding of¬†**47,600 USDC**¬†to give a Nounish makeover to a vacation rental property in Tokyo, Japan, valued over $1,000,000 USD. We intend to create ‚ÄúNouns House #1‚Äù with this funding. Our property has already completed interior and exterior renovations;¬†**all of the funding will be used for the Nounish makeover, and development of the mobile app.**

Beyond just providing the property for Nouns House #1,¬†**we will contribute 10% of the profits made from Nouns House #1 to the Nouns House DAO treasury for the first 5 years**. For future Nouns Houses real estates that are funded by the treasury, 100% of the profits will be returned to the treasury.

In alignment with NounsDAO‚Äôs¬†CC0 philosophy, we will make all software and hardware implemented in this project open source. Furthermore, we plan to collaborate with the Nouns projects that are active in Japan such as¬†**[pNouns](https://pnouns.wtf/en/)**¬†(**[Noun 553](https://nouns.wtf/noun/553)**,¬†**[Noun 556](https://nouns.wtf/noun/556)**) for events and promotions.

**The diverse industry experience of our team will significantly contribute to the success of this project.**¬†**[yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth)**¬†is a former executive CPO at Mercari,¬†**[yukill.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukill.eth)**¬†is a former CEO at ZOZO Technologies,¬†**[Jiro](https://twitter.com/jiroisagame)**¬†is a former YouTuber with 1.3 million subscribers, and I,¬†**[tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth)**, am a former engineer from Amazon Seattle.

This proposal was inspired by¬†**[Nouns Deli](https://twitter.com/NounsDeli)**‚Äôs proposal (**[Proposal 254](https://nouns.wtf/vote/254)**, approved on 03/09/2023). Our next step is to establish a Nounish subDAO, called ‚ÄúNouns House DAO‚Äù. Similar to the¬†**[Nouns Builder Protocol](https://nouns.build/)**¬†(**[Proposal 167](https://nouns.wtf/vote/167)**, approved on 11/12/2022), we aim to create a subDAO inheriting NounsDAO‚Äôs auction, treasury, and governance system. In the follow-up proposal, we plan to request initial funding for Nouns House DAO treasury, in order to create Nouns House #2 and subsequent Nouns Houses based on community decisions governed by the DAO.

## 1.  Nouns House DAO ‚åê‚óß-‚óß

Nouns House #1 created through this proposal will serve as the first Nouns House governed by Nouns House DAO. Following the successful execution of this proposal, we will submit a follow-up proposal to transfer initial funding to the Nouns House DAO treasury. This initial funding will be substantial enough to secure the purchase of the second Nouns House. The exact amount, along with detailed plans and specific property information, will be disclosed in this follow-up proposal. We believe that having initial funding in the treasury will create strong momentum for this new Nounish DAO.

Our goal is to establish Nouns Houses in major cities globally, allowing individuals to experience Nouns art and culture. Additionally, we aim to¬†**operate this as a profitable venture**, positioning Nouns House DAO as the pioneering Nounish subDAO that introduces a¬†**3rd revenue pillar for the treasury, complementing the NFT auctioning and ETH staking.**

Nouns House DAO will oversee the operation and financial management of all Nouns Houses.¬†**As a testament to our commitment, we will contribute 10% of the profits from Nouns House #1 to treasury for the first 5 years.**¬†For all subsequent real estates that are funded by the Nouns House DAO treasury, 100% of the profits will be directed back to the treasury.

![Bedroom](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1W23f_T6aANo9mXh9-lUu3bypKSzU12M4)

## 2. Enabler DAO / Core Team ‚åê‚óß-‚óß

Enabler DAO is a asset sharing community that aims to facilitate easy sharing of large assets like houses and cars by leveraging blockchain and AI technology.¬†As of November 2023, we operate 10 properties across 5 locations (Tokyo, Kyoto, Atami, Teshikaga, and Honolulu) in Japan and the United States. These properties are monetized through asset sharing within the community as well as through Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) such as Airbnb and Booking.com. Below are some of our properties and links to OTAs.

üáØüáµ [**WHITE HOUSE Atami**](https://airbnb.com/h/white-house-atami
) - Shizuoka, Japan
üáØüáµ [**MACHIYA Kyoto**](https://www.kyoto-machiya-inn.com/accommodations/hanatoki/
) - Kyoto, Japan
üáØüáµ [**THE NEST Teshikaga**](https://airbnb.com/h/the-nest-teshikaga) - Hokkaido, Japan
üá∫üá∏ [**BEACH HOUSE Honolulu**](https://airbnb.com/h/beach-house-honolulu-annex) - Hawaii, USA

![Properties](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1C5UfxmK62s98QryMGZ_SoTIpED1fTUru)

The 4 founders of Enabler DAO are¬†**[yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth)**¬†(**[Noun 312](https://nouns.wtf/noun/312)**), former executive CPO of Mercari;¬†**[yukill.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukill.eth)**, former CEO at ZOZO Technologies & fund manager for MZ Web3 Fund;¬†**[Jiro](https://twitter.com/jiroisagame)**, former YouTuber ‚ÄúCharisma Brothers‚Äù with 1.3 million subscribers & managing partner at iFund; and¬†**[tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth)**, a trilingual former Amazon HQ engineer with 5-years of experience. 

Enabler DAO was founded in October 2021, and we currently operate with about 10 DAO members.¬†We have been operating highly successful and profitable vacation rental properties in multiple locations (10~20% annual ROI), and bring expertise in both rental operations and property management.¬†Moreover, our diverse team brings a wide range of business and product development experience, combined with our strong track record,¬†**I believe we are in a unique position to be successful at running the first Nouns House.**

## **3. Nounish Makeover ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

We plan to transform our property in Aoyama, an upscale district in Tokyo, into "Nouns House #1," with a Nounish makeover filled with art and goodies. 

![Living Room](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1bwo_xZOKns30glLVRyeoQ7ROKojrQkIE)

Aoyama is a hub of designer boutiques, art galleries, cafes, and shopping districts. It's not only a attracts for affluent individuals but also a popular tourist destination. Given the area's reputation and successful track record of our nearby properties, **we anticipate strong demand for high-end vacation rental property in Aoyama.**

![Sauna](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1kabDge7tB6HDlZqn1fYccFdnsMt0-AdX)

In recent years, there has been a ‚Äúsauna boom‚Äù in Japan. The number of sauna enthusiasts has been increasing due to heightened health consciousness and the proliferation of sauna facilities. In fact, the number of sauna users in Japan has increased by more than one million in the past year, and high-end sauna facilities in Tokyo are extremely popular. **We believe that Nouns House #1 will become widely popular within the sauna communities and beyond.**

![Bath](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=190MOtkZF68sFwLUJzwbxoO4hNEtKDfch)

The artwork used for interior and exterior of Nouns House #1 will be directed by [amiyoko.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/amiyoko.eth) who have contributed many artwork to various Nouns projects such as NounsDAO Anniversary Art 2023 and Sushi Nouns.

![Exterior](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1bESaiRK3zLewixG-8MvEEq9HgIhnkbqc)

The 1st floor is the sauna area, the 2nd floor features a living-dining-kitchen area, and the 3rd floor will be an office space and a bedroom. We aim to infuse each floor with Nounish elements while maintaining a sense of luxury in the interior design.

![Chill](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1CvxZml-3RPmPaHxNUzN7yUE2DKu-wLyU)

## 4. Marketing Efforts **‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

To amplify the presence of Nouns House #1, **we will be forming a strategic partnership with a popular Japanese YouTuber group, [EvisJap](https://youtube.com/@EvisJap?si=6Oi6Ll6fIzis70ib).** With a subscriber base of 630,000, primarily young adults, they are known for their energetic travel blogs and lively social gatherings that resonate with the adventurous spirit of youth.

During the weekdays, EvisJap will be utilizing Nouns House #1 as their recording studio, bringing a creative buzz to the space while providing regular exposure of Nouns to a broad audience through their videos. On weekends, Nouns House #1 will transform into an luxury private sauna. This dual-use approach optimizes the utility of the property, and exemplifies the innovative and adaptive spirit of the Nouns.

This collaboration, born from our unique relationship with EbisJap, is a synergy that offers exposure to Nouns House without direct marketing efforts. The value of this organic promotion is an example of the unique contribution that our team brings to the Nouns community.

## **5. Mobile App ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

**We will develop a mobile app for facilitating reservations and assigning maintenance work for Nouns House DAO**. This app will be powered by open-source framework called¬†**[Skeet](https://skeet.dev/en/)**¬†which seamlessly integrates with Google Cloud Platform and Firebase, making it easier to develop serverless full-stack applications. 

It's worth noting that both Enabler and¬†**[El Soul Labo](https://labo.elsoul.nl/en/)**, the team behind Skeet, received equity funding from¬†**[East Ventures](https://east.vc/)**, one of the biggest venture capital fund in Asia. With the cutting edge Skeet framework and the invaluable support from the creator of Skeet, we can efficiently develop this app with just one engineer on our end.

The app will integrate with existing tools that offers API such as¬†**[Beds24](https://beds24.com/)**¬†for inventory management,¬†**[Sesame Smart Lock](https://jp.candyhouse.co/)**¬†for automatically issuing one-time guest keys, and¬†**[Stripe](https://stripe.com/en-jp)**¬†for fiat payment processing. In the interim, before our app release, we'll use¬†**[LINE](https://line.me/en/)**¬†and¬†**[LINE Marketplace](https://line-marketplace.com/jp/app)**¬†apps for chat-based reservation.

Furthermore, we will incorporate web3 capabilities such as token-gating and cryptocurrency payment into the app. We plan to offer special coupons and priority reservations to Nouns House NFT holders, and allow payments in major cryptocurrencies.

## **6. Utility Token ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

We plan to introduce a utility token which will be used for accessing Nouns House and can be earned through completing maintenance gigs listed in the app. **We envision some members of the Nouns House DAO to work maintenance gigs in order to earn the utility token.** We plan to use Solana chain for the token for 3 reasons: near-zero gas fees, rapid execution, and its integration with the user-friendly multi-chain wallet called Phantom. Enabler DAO has already been experimenting with Solana based utility token called [**EBR**](https://solscan.io/token/E1JxwaWRd8nw8vDdWMdqwdbXGBshqDcnTcinHzNMqg2Y) (available on [**Orca DEX**](https://v1.orca.so/liquidity/browse?tokenMint=E1JxwaWRd8nw8vDdWMdqwdbXGBshqDcnTcinHzNMqg2Y)) and have experience in this realm.

## **7. Roadmap ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

We will begin the Nounish makeover and the development of mobile app, immediately following the approval of this proposal.¬†In January 2024, we plan to pre-open Nouns House #1, followed by grand opening in February. Beta version of mobile app will be released in March, followed by production release in April. We will submit submit a follow-up proposal by Feburary 2024 to transfer initial funding for the DAO treasury followed by successful execution of this proposal.

![Roadmap](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1xkl6xzFYEi-rAtpjmnARWpc34Pj_Dlh4)

## **8. Budget ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

We are proposing **47,600 USDC funding for creating Nouns House #1 and to kick start the software infrastructure development for Nouns House DAO.**¬†The Nounish makeover will cost $17,000, and the development of the mobile app will cost $30,600. All work will commence immediately upon the approval of the proposal.

**Nouns House #1 Nounish Makeover: $17,000**
- "Nounish" Exterior Wall Art: $6,000
- "Nounish" Interior Art: $8,000
- "Nounish" Goodies: $3,000

**Mobile App (6-month development): $30,600**
- Founding Engineer: $5,000/month
- [Skeet](https://skeet.dev/en/)¬†(Enterprise Support): $100/month

## **9. Community Benefits ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

This proposal aims to **expand the Nouns community by creating the first "Nouns House", a network of properties where people can experience Nouns art and culture in major cities worldwide.**

In the next step, we will propose to transfer initial funding for Nouns House DAO treasury. This new Nounish subDAO will own Real World Asset (RWA) and operate them as a profit-making business. RWA is an area where the web3 industry is still struggling, and this new venture has the potential to significantly advance the industry on this front.

Nouns House NFT holders will be offered special perks such as discounted rates and priority access to Nouns Houses via token gating. Additionally, upon the funding of the Nouns House DAO treasury in our next proposal,¬†**existing Nouns NFT holders can apply for Nouns House NFT airdrop by a pre-determined date**. This airdrop is optional and provides an opportunity for existing NounsDAO members to participate in the governance for Nouns House DAO without having to bid in the auction.

## **10. CC0 ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

We believe, Nouns House‚Äôs CC0 culture will bring innovation to the real estate industry. While real estate design and architecture are generally not open-source, we will make all of these publicly available through our CC0 library. CC0 approach will also have a large impact on the vacation rental industry. **By providing tools to help achieve efficient operations, we will accelerate the automation and digital transformation of the vacation rental industry.**¬†The interest and attention that this CC0 model will generate within these industries will serve as the ideal platform for spreading the culture and values of Nouns.

## **11. Risks & Considerations ‚åê‚óß-‚óß**

We are enthusiastic members of the Nouns community and, as Noun owner, strongly resonate with the vision of Nouns. **We believe that the Nouns model holds innovative power in asset management and vacation rental fields.** This decentralized, community-led governance model has the potential to offer new approaches in asset sharing and feels like the ideal way to manage assets in a decentralized manner. On the other hand, there are some risks considered in achieving the vision of this project:

1. **Regulatory Risk**: Operating within a decentralized framework could potentially make the project subject to regulations. Compliance with local laws is crucial.
2. **Technical Risk**: The integration of blockchain technology with physical assets like real estate presents several challenges. The implementation of smart contracts to manage the property must be executed flawlessly.
3. **Community Engagement**: The strength of a DAO lies in its community. For long-term success, it's important to maintain community engagement and participation in governance.

By acknowledging these risks and proactively addressing them, we aim for the success of the Nouns House project.

proposals.title: Sasquatch Hunting

# Sasquatch Hunting

![Sasquatch Hunter](https://i.postimg.cc/br1s2yxW/snnj3fb.jpg)

The infamous Sasquatch, Noun 181, has continued to elude us.

I am proposing that we go on the hunt for it and bring it back to the treasury. In doing so, we can finally send it to it's rightful owner

- - -

**Context:**
[Proposal 428](https://nouns.wtf/vote/428) has just passed is and waiting to be executed. However, the transaction looks to send Noun 181 from the treasury to our [Sasquatch](https://warpcast.com/sasquatch). Unfortunately, that noun is currently held in the escrow contract.

The transaction on this prop would use the appropriate transaction to withdraw the noun from escrow into the DAO and allow the original prop to be executed as intended.

proposals.description:
# One Noun 3D Animation, Every Day ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó® (Revised)  

# 


**This is a  revised version of [Candidate: 2 YEARS OF EVERYDAY 3D ANIMATIONS ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®](https://www.nouns.camp/candidates/0x8e6ab6d4f70cc6e00a61498a427df5e9407ddf0e-2-years-of-everyday-3d-animations---), which incorporates all the given feedback via Twitter, Discord and Candidate comments.**


## **TL;DR**
NounsLATAM is seeking $50K to develop, produce and distribute daily 3D animated Noun-themed videos on a global scope for six months. 
Our initial aim was to develop, produce and distribute over 800 engaging 3D animated Noun-themed videos on a global scale for 2 years of everyday animations. With the feedback provided, we have adjusted the time frame to a six-month period, in which we will showcase the impact of Nouns in YouTube.

**PROOF OF WORK**
For the past 10 months, we have been producing non-stop Nouns-themed animated videos daily, and we are about to complete our first successful year. 
We have created over 300 daily animated videos, with over 20 million views, 100,000 hours of watch time, 30,000 subscribers, and 5,900 comments. We have also generated over 800,000 views from YouTube remixes. **All of this has been done with no funding coming from the DAO.**

Our team has self-funded all of our Nouns-themed animated video-work to date, demonstrating our commitment to Nouns DAO and our belief in its global potential.

**OUR IMPACT**
In our first 2.5 Months (in which we created 73 videos in 73 days), we became the top subscribed Nouns Content YouTube Channel, rising from 0 subscribers to 1.1K!
Today, 10 months in, we are currently at 33.8K subscribers on YouTube, a **30x** rise in subscribers. 
 **All this work was accomplished without any funding from the DAO!**
![](https://i.imgur.com/y1PVOsi.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/IPa6eh8.png)
*Today, we are the #1 most subscribed Nouns Channel in all of YouTube, and will be the first to cross the coveted 100,000 YouTube subscribers goal.*

![](https://i.imgur.com/elw5VlT.png)

**YOUTUBE STATS**
‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  20+ MILLION VIEWS
‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  [300+ Daily Animated Videos (in 3D!)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF)
‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  100,000+ Hours of watch time
‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  30,000+ Subscribers
‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  5900+ Comments
‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  800,000+ Views from Youtube Remixes

**‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  20+ MILLION VIEWS**
![](https://i.imgur.com/pGzV1yz.jpg)
*NounsLATAM's animated video content has gone viral, with our top three videos racking up over 15 million views combined.*


**[‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  300+ Daily Animated Videos (in 3D!)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF)**
As a **two-person** video editor and graphic designer team with over 22 years of combined experience, we have consistently created these Nouns-themed animated 3D videos for the past 10 months, working **exclusively (and full time)** on this proposal. 
![](https://i.imgur.com/aTKTfU6.jpg)
*Check out our process for making our daily animated 3D videos!*


**‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  100,000+ Hours of watch time**
 ![](https://i.imgur.com/e72R4ZQ.png)
***WE HAVE NEVER BOUGHT ADS**: 100,000 hours of organic watch time from people who really love our daily animated Nouns memes and stories, all in 3D!*



**‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  30,000+ Subscribers**
![](https://i.imgur.com/gJ1qU2Q.png)
*We began with zero subscribers and are about to cross 40,000. People love our Nouns content!*

![](https://i.imgur.com/2UzYzwf.png)
*Our strongest demographic is the 25 - 44 year old range!*


**‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  5900+ Comments**
![](https://i.imgur.com/byDikrL.png)
*Organic community and comments, from people all over the world who really love Nouns characters!*


**‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®  800,000+ Views from YouTube Remixes**
YouTube remixes make it easy for other creators to incorporate clips from our Nouns videos into their own original creations!
![](https://i.imgur.com/2EiQghC.png)
*People take our Nouns content, create new videos and proliferate the Nouniverse because they love our animations!* 

  
**PROPOSAL DELIVERABLES**
This proposal will cover **six months** of NounsLATAM 3D daily animated videos. 

1. Provide high quality, DAILY content, deliverables which are as follows:
-   200 3D animated daily videos 
-   One animation a day x 6 months  (=180)
-   An additional twenty (20) 3D animated videos to round off an even 200 deliverables (To be used for special occasions / holiday / trending topics )
-   Check out our [First 300+ Nouns Animated 3D Videos](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF)!

2. Onboard additional Nouns characters from both holders and Nouns communities, to further grow Nouns exposure!
3. We will decentralize our 3D assets by making them freely downloadable and available to all who want to use them!
 
![](https://i.imgur.com/Klwpwjf.png)
*Every Noun holder, community and NounsDAO participants can request their characters animated!*

**NounsLATAM will become the first (and so far only) Nouns YouTube channel to cross 100,000 subscribers, and earn a YouTube Creator Award. (2025)*
![](https://i.imgur.com/Zn11Dxu.jpg)
*This will be an incredible achievement for the DAO. NounsDAO will become the first web3 NFT Collection to have its name engraved in a YouTube Creator Award.*

**BREAKDOWN**
NounsLATAM is seeking $50,000 to develop, produce and distribute over 200 engaging 3D animated Noun-themed videos on a global scope for 6 Months of everyday animations. 
![](https://i.imgur.com/IDGeagO.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/ZMhHy4Q.png)


## **NounsLATAM TEAM**
NounsLATAM is a team of creators who use digital and physical channels to expand the Nouns brand and community around the world.
![](https://i.imgur.com/kxkDPwr.png)

**NOUNS CONSTRIBUTIONS INCLUDES:** 
Prop.House ‚Ä¢ Nouns Strategic Funding Works (NSFW) ‚Ä¢ Self-finance.   

**DIGITAL:**
-    Created the first NounsDAO / LilNounsDAO [Spanish onboarding website ](https://nounslatam.wtf/spanish-onboarding)
-    Hosted Spanish [Twitter Spaces](https://nounslatam.wtf/twitter-spaces) (1000+ total listeners)
-    One of the firsts communities to create flag assets into the [Composables](https://nounslatam.wtf/composables) ecosystem!
-    3D designed & created [The Noggles Stickers pack](https://nounslatam.wtf/noggles-stickers-pack) (available on IG, FB, TikTok...)
-    3D designed, created & animated [NounsLATAM POAPs x The Nouns Square](https://nounslatam.wtf/poaps)
-    Created [Nounish GIFs](https://nounslatam.wtf/gifs) // [Holiday GIFs](https://nounslatam.wtf/holiday-gifs) //  [GIF Factory: Nouns Builder Meme GIFs ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®](https://x.com/NounsLatam/status/1619583275663753216?s=20)
-    Built [Nouns Metaverse Museum (Voxels/ CryptoVoxels)](https://nounslatam.wtf/metaverse-museum)
-    Illustrated, 3D designed & created [Viral multiplatform stickers](https://nounslatam.wtf/viral)
-  3D designed & animated on [YouTube: 3D animations everyday](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF) (+300 days!)


**IRL:**
-    Designed 30+ different types of never before seen, unique, and awesome [NounsLATAM / Nouns DAO merch](https://nounslatam.wtf/merch) distributed in different events across different countries [including Nouns at DEVCON (Colombia) & LABITCONF (Argentina)] 
-    [web3 printed memes](https://nounslatam.wtf/memes)
-    Proliferated IRL NounsLATAM - web3 Memes in Latin American Cities (Bogot√°, Barranquilla, Cartagena, Buenos Aires):
    - [Latin American OTG activation TOUR of three cities @Colombia](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/latin-american-otg-activation-tour-of-three-cities-colombia/2338/13)
    - Proliferated LATAM Events:
        - [DEVCON @Colombia](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/latin-american-otg-activation-tour-of-three-cities-colombia/2338/13)
        - Latin American BlockchainConference - [LABITCONF @Argentina](https://x.com/NounsLatam/status/1598838063962107905?s=20)
-    Proliferated Cultural Monuments and places (Window to the World; a volcano: Totumo mud volcano; [first to Nounify a World Heritage Site: The Vaults in the Walled City in Cartagena)](https://twitter.com/NounsLatam/status/1581789057746874368?s=20)
-    Charity work: Gave merch away to [kids in need, parents, and public workers](https://twitter.com/NounsLatam/status/1600928852314062849) during the NounsLATAM OTG activation in Colombia & as part of [Nounish Holidays in 30 Cities.](https://twitter.com/NounsLatam/status/1607852091724419078?s=20)

![](https://i.imgur.com/XE0goLI.jpg)


![](https://i.imgur.com/EKTCCCW.png)

votes.reason: Nounish
Agree with the other against votes. Not sure we need more daily animations.

i get the alignment with facu's reasoning. but perhaps they're not finding it engaging because they're not a child. 

showed these videos to friend's kid. me: " you like this." kid: "yes." me: "what you like about it?" kid: "funny glasses [giggling]." 

not everything has to fit our own cultural sensibilities. an aside, but take ux for example - what's the norm in the east looks like clutter to us westerners. since "quality" is subjective and most of the against votes against are based on assumptions, i'll take the objective approach. 

this thing is doing numbers. most parents with young kids are likely between 25 and 44 years old (excuse the assumption lol :dead_inside:) and that's probably why the analytics show such a viewership. 

so there's a very good chance, good enough to take a $50k bet, that the kids watching these videos like them. send it
If you want Props with strong KPIs, Vote FOR this prop. Vote for impact.

We have already spent quite a bit on Nouns-related video and animation productions (The Line, Nounish). We have the long-term side of the budget covered, and could use more bets on the short-term, very experimental end. This falls in the middle -- would rather see us give a couple of ETH to 1 - 2 dozen animators than $50K to one project.

*sent from voter.wtf*

I like it honestly. They've executed well on building traction and getting viewership without any ads, which is something we've candidly struggled with in other related props. The ask is also pretty small, a little over 1 auction. Re: the nature of the content I resonate with Gami's reasoning.

ü•å x FOR
‚Ü≥ benbodhi.eth

I'm an experiment in throwing weight behind zero weight votes with reason.
I want them to keep going. they saw their traction on YT, they created a ton before coming for funding and this is a modest ask for 6 months.

Congratulations on the growth, it's great.
It could be that I'm getting old or that I prefer quality over quantity, but I just can't get engaged with the videos. :)
strong impact over the last 10 months. reasonable budget. good content. supportive.

not personally super excited by the content but impressive metrics without funding. willing to experiment with funding and see what a difference it makes

Impressive growth. Nice to have more assets that others can use. Keep pushing!

proposals.title: CC0 Nouns Themed Playground + Build : Spread Nouns Design And Ideology Worldwide Through Fun And Play
proposals.description:
# CC0 Nouns Themed Playground + Build : Spread Nouns Design And Ideology Worldwide Through Fun And Play

### **[UPDATE]**
This is a version 2 of [[Prop 408: First IRL Nouns Themed Playground]](https://nouns.wtf/vote/408) where we have input more details based on feedback received.

Also to show our resolve, we've worked on the detailed design and have it build out as well. This demonstration is needed to show the DAO the feasibility and possibility we can achieve.

*Click on the image below to view a walkthrough.*
[![L7dS9Q9.png](https://i.imgur.com/L7dS9Q9.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4UGCEiB8qAQ)

![1NxmApU.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/1NxmApU.jpg)
![lqa53gh.gif](https://i.imgur.com/lqa53gh.gif)

### **tl;dr;**
- Construct the first physical **CC0 Public Nouns Themed Playground.** (2000sqm in size)
- Release **open-source** Nouns themed play-structure design kit (Total: 12 models).
    - Kit will contain detailed info, including 3D model, structure's geometry, material, etc
- **Scale** Nouns themed play-structures and **attract new creator/audience** into Nouns.
    - Incorporate Nouns themed play-structures into min. 10 other industry professionals' catalogs
    - Share this nounish activation on architecture platform like ArcDaily or other related media
- Lead by Karl and Noun74 (Nic).
- ***Location:*** Guangzhou, Haizhu District, Pazhou; adjacent to Element 6 recreational hub that have an avg 800K mthly visitors.
- Request **594,850 USDC**.

### **Summary**
**Challenged noticed within the DAO:** Attract and have a diverse group of creators, builders, and audiences participating & contributing to the protocol.

**Objectives of this proposal:**
1. Create a large scale tangible Nounish **Public Good**.
2. To attract a **new subgroup** of creatives & audience to Nouns.
3. To achieve **self-sustaining long term** proliferation globally via the distribution and adoption of cc0 Nouns themed play-structures design.

![A3Dgxek.png](https://i.imgur.com/A3Dgxek.png)

**As a builder in Nouns:**
1. To inspire community members to **leverage their networks** and create impactful proposals.
2. Become an **enabler for Nouns community** to ease interactions with both well-established brands and non-crypto organizations.
3. Showcase the **versatility** of Nouns' cc0 assets.

**Strategy (Focus on long-term continuity):**
- Use this Nouns Themed Playground as a monument that compliment the open-source design kit.  
    - Showcase the design and instill trust in its playability.
    - Distribute open-source design to at least 10 industry professionals and **incorporate** our Nouns themed play-structures **in their product catalogs**
    - Expand Nouns network value and **boost adoption** of Nouns themed play-structures.
    - Scale Nouns themed play-structures organically
- Submit this Nouns Themed Playground project to architecture platform like [ArcDaily](https://www.archdaily.com/); to **gain attention from new audience** into Nouns.
*(we are already in contact with ArcDaily CN curator)*
    - Open-source design kit will be uploaded but not limited to: github, cco-library, platform like Arcdaily, Bimstore, etc.
    - Allowing anyone who can build it in their region to plug and build easily.
- Apart from a **high quality documentary** to tell our story, we will also leverage on media partners.
    - Sharing BTS footage as short format videos, to **rally attention,** **enhance curiosity**, bringing fans along on this journey, as we show progression and erect our first Nouns Themed Playground.
        - Content will be shared on but not limited to: X, Farcaster, IG, Tiktok, Youtube, Little Red Book, etc.
        - New fans are also able to ask questions about Nouns along this journey.
    - Prop progression will also be shared and updated timely on [Propdates.wtf](https://www.propdates.wtf/)

## **Nouns Themed Play-Structures**
On top of the initial batch of play-structures, we will also identify **additional 4 Nouns characters** with the design team. These will also be created into play structures and release as part of our open-source design kit, to provide a more **diverse range** of play options which would help boost adoption.    

Below are the initial batch of play-structure design:
![PvesMIo.png](https://i.imgur.com/PvesMIo.png)
![fixz9u4.png](https://i.imgur.com/fixz9u4.png)
![YkWRXSB.png](https://i.imgur.com/YkWRXSB.png)
![djZZ0Ad.png](https://i.imgur.com/djZZ0Ad.png)

![iUgJbGz.png](https://i.imgur.com/iUgJbGz.png)
![gkAgf1V.png](https://i.imgur.com/gkAgf1V.png)

![plrxaMQ.png](https://i.imgur.com/plrxaMQ.png)

![nnoE35D.png](https://i.imgur.com/nnoE35D.png)
![1ntFyVf.png](https://i.imgur.com/1ntFyVf.png)
![Z0XcwVm.png](https://i.imgur.com/Z0XcwVm.png)
![TOfLCiK.png](https://i.imgur.com/TOfLCiK.png)
![6B1HsP6.png](https://i.imgur.com/6B1HsP6.png)
![FAesqnE.png](https://i.imgur.com/FAesqnE.png)


### **Site Visual**
![pPKg3fq.png](https://i.imgur.com/pPKg3fq.png)
![RyDHDCm.png](https://i.imgur.com/RyDHDCm.png)

## **FAQ:**
**1. Is this playground open to public?**
Yes! This will be a public playground that is accessible to everyone; a large scale tangible Nounish public good.

**2. Is the land for the themed playground secured?**
Yes! We have secured a 2000sqm plot of land beside Element 6 to construct this themed playground.

**3. What is Element 6?**
Element 6, located in Guangzhou, is a recreational hub with a diverse range of indoor and outdoor activities, include but not limited to go-karting, rock climbing, surf simulator and more; drawing an average monthly footfall of 800,000 visitors. It operates as a subsidiary under the XiangNeng Investment conglomerate.

*Click on the image below to watch their introduction.*
[![804iyWZ.png](https://i.imgur.com/804iyWZ.png)](https://youtu.be/IlRq1ZJtYPA)
**4. Are there any liability concerns?**
Liabilities are covered under Element 6's insurance that enveloped both indoor and outdoor activities.

**5. Will we encounter any permit issues?**
Element 6 owns the land and it is commercially zoned, where the proposed construction work aligns with zoning regulations. We've also conducted due diligence, including consulting with the authorities, and received verbal approval thus, we are confidence in obtaining the final official approval in a timely manner.

**6. Can this prop be done in phases?**
Progressing in phases to protect the DAO's interest is an ideal approach; however, the land allocation offered to us isn't available in perpetual for gradual proposals process. Therefore, we've structured the funding in a manner that allow us to commit to this project with an initial release, while the rest is released via stream as we progress, which the DAO can halt if any unforeseen issues arise.

**7. Why not just fund the design of the play-structures?**
Funding open-source product is Nounish; however, it's wasteful without utilization, and its impact is diminished in the absence of (in this case) tangible play-structure to showcase actual playability and potential. The physical Nouns Themed Playground would help facilitate the propagation of such reusable components to other location & industry professionals with greater effectiveness.

**8. How is this prop scalable?**
Playground equipment had a market share of $4.91 billion in 2022, with a projected increase to $9.65 billion by 2030, reflecting a 7% CAGR from 2023 to 2030. This highlights a linear growth in this market.

The physical Nouns themed playground would allow us to showcase and build trust with industry professionals, allowing us to share our open-source designs with them, to have them integrate Nouns themed play-structures into their product catalogs confidently. We are able to promote open-source while at the same time allowing us to **leverage on their clientele and this growing market, boosting adoption** of Nouns themed play-structures in playgrounds worldwide, given the preference for catalog-based designs by most clients.


Furthermore, anyone, especially builders in Nouns community can also use this activation as a monument to ease interaction with their local town that do not have playground or intent to build a playground, to eventually plug and build a Nouns Themed Playground using the open-source design.
 
## **Budget**

**[UPDATE]**
*We've secured a new contractor for the design and fabrication of our Nouns themed play-structure, reducing cost by 12%.*

### **Allocation**
The total proposed budget is **594,850 USD** for 6mths duration, with an allocation as follows:

**1. Construction: 522,850 USDC**
* Immediate release: **200,000 USDC**
* Remaining via *Stream 1*: **80,712.5 x 4 = 322,850 USDC**
     
**2. Team Compensation: 72,000 USDC**
* Immediate release: **24,000 USDC**
* Remaining via *Stream 2/3*: **(6,000 x 2pax) x 4 = 48,000 USDC**
   
**Total Immediate release: 224,000 USDC**
**Total Stream over 4mths: 370,850 USDC**

*Stream start 1st Jan'24 - End 30th Apr'24*
![LLUSxWp.png](https://i.imgur.com/LLUSxWp.png)
### **Breakdown**
![Hq53eOk.png](https://i.imgur.com/Hq53eOk.png)
### **Timeline**
![lvDlVh4.png](https://i.imgur.com/lvDlVh4.png)

## **Who we are!**
For Nouns community who do not know who we are, allow us to introduce ourselves.

![JSehkp9.gif](https://i.imgur.com/JSehkp9.gif)

We are [Karl (Nouncil)](https://twitter.com/WideEyeKarI) and [Nic (Noun74)](https://twitter.com/noun_74) & we've been active with Nouns since Jul 2022.
We have:

- brought Nouns presence into China with IRL activation at [Shanghai](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1640922970330738688), [Beijing](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1663381928278409218), [ChengDu](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1672628395300257793) as well as [Singapore](https://twitter.com/nounsinsg/status/1567474695536283650)
- created ["Nogge chair"](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1641044874358304768) which is at Himalayas Art Museum as a public infrastructure
- release free to collect Nouns digital collectables with [Shina Weibo](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1648670544404025344)
- organized [art contest](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1658012368063062016) allowing more Chinese artist to get exposure to Nouns
- assisted local cafe in Beijing in putting up a [Nouns mural](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1667187943709245440)
- onboarded local animator to create a [short shorts for Nouns](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1681867478887202817) (releasing soon)
- facilitated the [inclusion of Nouns into a web3 introduction book](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1675778263678070787) which is available at bookstores throughout China
- onboarded award winning music producer Hanjin Tan, who will be debuting "Noggle Chair" in his [musical theatre show in HongKong](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1719904562239471814)
- created a [Nouns statue serving as a public good infrastructure (signage)](https://twitter.com/Nounscn/status/1708330846275682776) at Mount Liupian, Guangzhou
- worked on various IRL charitable public good activations, including [nounifying a local autism school](https://twitter.com/nounsinsg/status/1585995683168821248), [Nounish Holiday Season](https://twitter.com/nounsinsg/status/1606688371119915008)
- kick started green initiative public good activation in the form of [beach clean up](https://twitter.com/nounsinsg/status/1559183156887990273) which spark a [clean up contest by TNS](https://twitter.com/thenounsquare/status/1560882911100174336) that eventually started [Nouns Africa](https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye/status/1562433784922148864)
- assisted byWassies in creating our very [first Nouns themed hotel room](https://twitter.com/WideEyeKarI/status/1632224927763042305)

Beyond our involvement in Web 3, both of us possess over a decade experience in project management. We have conducted thorough due diligence to ensure the **full feasibility** of our proposal. We are highly confident in our ability to execute this project according to our planned schedule & strategy.

We have dedicated half a year to reach this stage where we can present this idea to you.
Let's create this **epic tangible Nouns public goods** together, bringing us one huge step closer as we further Nouns mission in becoming the greatest engine for public goods.

votes.reason: Impact vs cost.
1+ seneca

After speaking with Karl about the proposal and addressing my concerns about splitting the proposal up into the two phases (design & build) He alleviated those by explaining that they did all the due diligence to get the land ready for building out the playground ahead of time and that just doing the design wouldn't guarantee they have the land in the future. Also, if any issues come up during development, the dao has control over the streamed payments and can end it, if progress isn't being made. I personally think that this was a very carefully thought out and well designed proposal that is worth executing on. They have done significant work ahead of any funding to get it to where it is today and thats worth consideration. Some people may not like the current designs, but the team is willing to work and get feedback to make the play structures look/feel good. 

Pls listen to the Tavern for our conversation: https://alpha.tavern.fm/taverns/8oJLjKWddfQC4op68ezr

+1 to Seneca‚Äôs focus on the design kit. If this scales, the design kit is an excellent 80/20 solution. The designs can and should stand on their own for adoption, in keeping with much of CC0 culture. Funding the build too seems like a significant cost without as much impact beyond the single playground

*sent from voter.wtf*

Appreciate the effort gone into the designs and the proposal. I'm probably a no here; I just feel skeptical that we're going to see a real strong impact for Nouns relative to the amount we'd be spending on the proposal. I think for IRL efforts we're better off with lean grassroots community building than high-cost structures et cetera. I like what's been mentioned earlier about making the designs potentially as a primary end product and using the architecture community as an entry point.

I'm an experiment in throwing weight behind zero weight votes with reason.

RE: local
The physical playground, despite being a localized investment in local facilities, but the easily overlooked fact that, without successful precedents, no one would risk replicating a playground for a completely new community brand.  The physical playground conveys open-source culture, *setting us apart from other commercial brands* and *providing a unique reason* for playground replicators to adopt. All of this happens without regional restrictions. 

**Nouns' experimental direction should be diverse.**  

I am glad to be part of this great experiment, engaging in discussions with all viewpoints. Thanks again to all the prop supporters and opponents for the discussions! :-)

I find myself judging proposals these days in large part according to how they add to the overall lore of Nouns. I‚Äôve always thought too that it would be cool for Nouns to fund the sort of real world public goods that governments normally would, and this is a pretty good opportunity to try. I do think the scope is maybe a little bit extra, but the designs look really great to me and I think it will make a great chapter to add to the Nouns story, while also directly benefiting the children who will use it.
