proposals.title: Nouns Game Publisher: Changing the Game
proposals.description:
# Nouns Game Publisher: Changing the Game

![Nouns Game Site](https://i.imgur.com/NfGOCNb.jpg)

üïπÔ∏è *Imagine a gaming website full of Nouns games ...*
## TL;DR
### Increasing the Value of Nouns with Games, by:

* Designing a set of **Games for Nouns Communities** 
* Publishing **6 new games** for iOS and **6 prototypes** for web
* Creating a **Nouns CC0 Gaming Toolkit** for Unity game devs
* Building a **nounsgames.wtf** gaming website and publishing pipeline
* Launching **Nouns x Games** collabs with shared revenue models

### Ask
* Invest **199 ETH** in the Games category

---

# Why should Nouns invest in games?

[![Games Industry Chart](https://i.imgur.com/sSwx3ro.jpg)](https://www.visualcapitalist.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/history-of-gaming-by-revenue-share-full-size.html)

üîé ZOOM [50 Years of Video Games](https://www.visualcapitalist.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/history-of-gaming-by-revenue-share-full-size.html)

## Games are a smart investment for a brand like Nouns
* In 2022, the number of gamers worldwide was around **3 billion**
* In the US alone, Nouns games can reach up to **215 million people** 
* For Nouns to **capture attention** in this market, **investing in games** is essential

### 5 Business Reasons
* Games are a simple way to **onboard new users** to Nouns and its concepts
* Games can **increase the collection value** of Nouns with in-game utility
* Games can **make money** with minting, IAP, subscriptions and sales
* Games provide **data and insights** about audience behavior and tastes
* Games **help Nouns compete** with other top collections in the space

### 5 Creative Reasons
* Games allow Nouns to **experiment with new technology** and innovate
* Games **expand the IP universe** with new storylines, characters, and worlds
* **Gamified collecting experiences** engage players and extend gameplay
* **Interactive storytelling** in games is more personalized and immersive
* Games **strengthen the brand identity** by engaging fans in new ways

### What are the best platforms for investment?
* For Nouns: **mobile games** are the best entry point
 
![Global Games Market](https://i.imgur.com/SGtwGJe.png)

---

# Problem

## Games aren't getting funded by Nouns - right now Nouns has 0 active investments in gaming

‚ùó Just **1 mobile game** has been funded: **Nouns Run**

![Nouns Run](https://i.imgur.com/qnl2vqN.gif)
This side-scroller was funded for **2 ETH** by a Prop House win - **2 years ago**

### 70 Proposals, 1 mobile game ... here's the research:
* [Nouns Games Proposals - History](https://hackmd.io/@bowlingseed/nounsgameshistory)

### üëâ *A new approach to funding games is needed*

---

# Solution
## Nouns Game Publisher
### Launching games in collaboration with Nouns communities
![Nouns Game Site](https://i.imgur.com/8DlTcCg.jpg)
### What we're building:

* **Games** - web games & iOS apps designed for communities
* **Gaming website** a place to playtest new games
* **Nouns CC0 Gaming Toolkit** game-ready assets for Unity
* **Game Dev Discord** community for game builders
* **Marketing Machine** to get the word out about Nouns games

---

# Here's the Gameplan

## Part 1. Build Nouns Bowling as a Lead Title
Nouns Bowling is a new 3D bowling game built with CC0 assets from the [3D Nouns](https://3dnouns.com) and [Noun Sounds](https://nounsounds.wtf) projects. This game is LIVE on the [iOS App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nouns-bowling/id1660679079) today!

Bowling is popular on **all gaming platforms** and can blaze a trail for publishing multi-platform Nouns games. Bowling is an approachable, universal game and appeals to all age groups.

### üëâ Play Nouns Bowling: [nounsbowling.app](https://nounsbowling.app)
![Nouns Bowling](https://i.imgur.com/xqmhQNc.jpg)

[![Nouns Bowling](https://i.imgur.com/5TKGiiU.jpg)](https://youtu.be/A-FBNGRYy4A)

WATCH VIDEO: [Nouns Bowling trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-FBNGRYy4A&list=PLQLUWbPbAeHEdkgI9PFPj7lShFrCg_iPI&index=1)

### Here‚Äôs what the funding is for:
- **Core technology** - build key technology for the other games here
- **3D Art and Animation** - expand the game and boost production values
- **Metagame** - features to wrap core gameplay, reusable in other games
- **Teams feature** - adding team competition between Nouns houses
- **Prizes feature** - adding prize competitions for game nights

‚≠ê *Includes new 3D bowling alleys for Nouns communities:*

* **Nouns Alley** - the original alley for the OG Nouns
* **Lil Nouns Lanes** - a big bowling alley for the Lil Nouns
* **FOODNOUNs Bowl** - tasty environment with an OTG angle
* **Gnarly Bowl** - a gnarly alley for extreme bowling athletes

---

## Part 2. Establish the Nouns CC0 Gaming Toolkit
As we build Nouns Bowling, we'll create the **Nouns CCO Gaming Toolkit**:

* **3D Nouns characters** - game-ready Unity assets based on [3D Nouns](https://3dnouns.com)
* **2D Nouns characters** - game-ready Unity assets from [Nouns Sprite Sheets](https://nouns.wtf/vote/201)
* **Famous Characters** - famous Nouns NPC characters with AI features
* **Nouns 3D environments** - models and other 3D assets 
* **Useful Unity systems** - to help devs build Nouns games quickly

### Competitive Advantage for Nouns
No traditional games business would release 3D characters, environments and gaming IP into the public domain. **What if Mario was a CC0 brand?** ü§Ø

![Nouns 3D Characters in Unity](https://i.imgur.com/6eGYUvg.gif)

üï∫ Game-ready **3D Nouns** ready to rock

### ‚≠ê Including this BONUS item ...
![Rose Parade Nouns Float](https://i.imgur.com/FVe75yc.jpg)

![Rose Parade Nouns Float](https://i.imgur.com/PdwSIRV.png)

üöß 3D model of the Rose Parade Float - as seen in Nouns Bowling üöß

### Rose Parade float CC0 asset:
- Game-ready Unity package with characters and animations
- FBX assets for use in Blender or other game engines like Unreal
- Rendered images for use in videos or on websites

‚≠ê *Just one example of a useful Nouns 3D gaming asset!*

---

## Part 3. Fire Up a Game Publishing Pipeline üî•
### Process for prototyping and shipping Nouns games
Competition in games is fierce - only the **top games** in each genre survive. Two ways to win: be a top game in an existing genre, or create a **new game genre**. 

Lots of prototyping, with rounds of cuts, is the method used by savvy game businesses.

### Pipeline Steps
1. **Proposals** - generate new ideas and proposals
2. **Prototypes** - build prototypes for web
3. **Betas** - fund betas for web and iOS
4. **Ship** - ship top games on web, mobile
5. **Publish** - take Nouns games to new gaming platforms

![Nouns Publishing Pipeline](https://i.imgur.com/0Z8HLPr.png)

This game publishing pipeline is designed to deliver a **stream of prototypes** to playtest, while attracting new builders to Nouns. 

This proposal delivers **12 prototypes** and **6 winners** will be pubished as iOS apps.

---

## Part 4. Launch a Nouns gaming website
### Purpose
* First place to launch prototypes (early access for NFT holders)
* Run beta testing before shipping games to mobile
* Best platform for web3 experiments and innovation

### Playable Prototypes

[![Nouns Game Site](https://i.imgur.com/D7xZuVA.png)](https://nounsgames.wtf)

üïπÔ∏è You can play these game prototypes at [**nounsgames.wtf**](https://nounsgames.wtf)

### Future Website
Imagine a web gaming site like [Poki.com](https://poki.com) where ALL games are Nouns games!

### No Gatekeepers
These web games will run on **mobile devices in a browser**!
... this is a solution for **mobile gaming** without App Stores

*NOTE: we **will** also publish iOS apps with advanced features*

---

## Part 5. Publish and Evolve Nouns Games
![Evolution](https://i.imgur.com/HCODOxx.png)

### Marketing and Evolution
The marketing fund (24 ETH) will be used to onboard new players to Nouns through games, while providing insight into customer preferences.

Gaming metrics - engagement and retention - help make decisions on:

* Which prototypes to fund
* When a beta is ready to ship
* When to scale up advertising

Round by round, games evolve, and small experiments guide the way.

Evolution rules.

---

# Discord Strategy

## Provide games for existing Nouns communities
* Web games are easy to decentralize and customize for communities
* Our standard web build has Daily high scores - perfect for prizes
* Each game we build is designed for one or more communities

## Build a new Discord for game devs

Discord is the best place for:
* Onboarding game devs to Nouns
* Trying new game prototypes
* Review of gaming metrics
* Brainstorming new game concepts
* Experimenting with new technology like AR

#### üëâ Join the [Nouns Games Discord](https://discord.gg/Ez3KnkrrVk) server

---

# Design Philosophy

## Building Apps for the Whole World

The [Nouns Virtuous Cycle](https://medium.com/@punk4156/the-nouns-virtuous-cycle-95586bb9c7c9) calls for "consumer apps the whole world wants to use"

![Nouns Virtuous Cycle](https://i.imgur.com/yh7H6BX.jpg)

Did punk4156 foresee a gaming future? ü§î
#### üåé *The whole world wants to use Nouns games ...* üïπÔ∏èüò∫

### Games are consumer apps ...
* Played across all gaming devices and age groups
* Games are played by **3 billion people** worldwide
* **Casual games** play to the largest audience

### Simple games are the most universal ...
Here are 5 genres of game with broad appeal
* 2D Puzzle games
* 2D Platform Hopper games
* 3D Kart driving games
* 3D Sports titles (think Wii Sports)
* Simple multiplayer games (for communities)


### Web games on mobile are the new frontier ...

[![Alps Snowboarding](https://i.imgur.com/qlc8ieW.gif)](https://nounsgames.wtf/snowboarding)

üëâ *[3D snowboarding](https://nounsgames.wtf/snowboarding) runs in Safari on iPhone!*

---

# Budget
### Summary

* Gaming Website - **20 ETH**
* Game Production - **155 ETH**
* Marketing Fund - **24 ETH**

## üí∞ 199 ETH Total

---

## Budget Breakdown
### Gaming Website - 20 ETH
* Design, build and launch the [**nounsgames.wtf**](https://nounsgames.wtf) gaming website
* Publish web games and prototypes for playtesting
* Prepare web games for publishing across the Nouniverse

### Nouns Bowling - 35 ETH
![Bowling Budget](https://i.imgur.com/NGr70PB.png)

### 5 New Games - 100 ETH
Designed with **specific Nouns communities** in mind
![Games Budget Table](https://i.imgur.com/nNUTAts.png)

### 6 New Prototypes - 10 ETH
* Establish a fund for prototyping new web games
* Finding new **blue ocean mechanics** is one goal
* Testing new **game development talent** is another

### Nouns CC0 Unity Gaming Toolkit - 10 ETH
* Nouns 3D Characters for Unity game developers
* Nouns 3D Environments for use across Unity games
* Rose Parade Float CC0 model for community projects
* Useful Unity systems to quickly add Nouns to games
* Deliver as a FREE Unity Asset Store package

### Marketing Fund - 24 ETH
Run measurable advertising experiments to inform design
* Small paid advertising experiments bring in new players
* Campaign results help inform the game design process
* Web game metrics help select the games to ship as iOS apps

### Budget Details
We are asking for a total of **199 ETH**

* Art - **52.5 ETH**
* Design - **17.5 ETH**
* Engineering - **105 ETH**
* Marketing - **24 ETH**

### Multi-Sig & Transactions
Upon successfully passing the prop, **199 ETH** will be sent to a 6 person multi-sig requiring 3 signatures for each send:

1. modrovsky
2. Kwik
3. kerimbonia
4. TheGrandEnnui
5. Gio4NFT
6. TCarti

---

# ROI for Nouns
### Increasing the value of Nouns with games

![Online Games Market](https://i.imgur.com/WkBDGip.png)
## Games are a category with excellent ROI potential
üëâ 10 ways to **capture attention** and **create value** for Nouns:

### 1. Minting NFTs with Shared Revenue Models üí∞
Generate revenue for Nouns communities by minting gaming collectibles

### 2. Increasing Value of Nouns
Games can **increase auction prices** of NFTs by adding in-game utility

### 3. In App Purchases
Traditional in-app purchase model for digital items on mobile

### 4. Games Meets Toys
Game-enabled toys capture attention and increase toy sales

### 5. Traditional Game Sales
Sell games for $USD on traditional gaming marketplaces

### 6. Subscriptions
Subscribe to the gaming website, or for individual games

### 7. Advertising
Rewarded video ads and other non-intrusive methods only

### 8. Collection Metagames
Completing a collection of digital items across games

### 9. Merchandise
Clothes and accessories with QR codes to load in-game

### 10. IRL Gaming Events
Play games to win a spot in real-life tournaments (like bowling)

---

# Team
![Kwik](https://i.imgur.com/1IrhJvn.png)
### Game Designer & Programmer
[**Kwik**](https://twitter.com/bowlingseed) ‚Äî Game developer with 36 shipped games (20+ year career in games)
Here are 12 picks (**click to watch YouTube videos**)

[![Kwik Gameography on YouTube](https://i.imgur.com/0i0sgBN.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQLUWbPbAeHFAL_laWR4Zi3oMcIYlhPhZ)
üëâ WATCH GAME VIDEOS: [Gameography on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQLUWbPbAeHFAL_laWR4Zi3oMcIYlhPhZ)

---

![kerimbonia](https://i.imgur.com/vzwTjlm.gif)
### Art Director
[**kerimbonia**](https://twitter.com/kerimbonia) ‚Äî Artist, Animator and creator of [Nouns Animated Spritesheets](https://nouns.wtf/vote/201)

*"Professional 3D artist with over 20 years of experience. Previous clients include Lamborghini, Nintendo, Warner Bros., Taylor Swift, Justin Timberlake, and Rihanna to name a few."*

![Spritesheet Project](https://i.imgur.com/iPGAqQJ.gif)

### Team

* **TheGrandEnnui** ‚Äî Super fly Unity game programmer
* **Yung TCarti** ‚Äî Discord and community operator
* **Gio4NFT** ‚Äî Consiglieri and distinguished advisor
* Network of contract game developers and artists

### Looking to hire ...
* web3 developers - to build a next-gen gaming website
* Artists and 3D animators - to work on games
* Game devs skilled in Unity - new builders for Nouns
* Marketers and social promoters - spreadin' the word
* Designers and content creators - always valuable

---

# Timeline
## 9 Months
July 2023 - March 2024

---

# FAQ
### Will this be setup as a DAO? No.
There will be no DAO for this project. Here's why:
* There are a LOT of Nouns DAOs, let's build games for those
* Game selection by DAO vote may not be the best option
* Better to keep freedom for individual games to have DAOs

### What about running ads in the games?
Running annoying ads between levels ruins a lot of good games. But **rewarded ads** and **sponsorships** can work. In-game ads can also **promote other Nouns projects**.

Running video ads featuring Nouns **in other people's games** is one advertising strategy. Nouns get video views AND game installs.

### What about Tokens and Play-to-Earn?
**Hot take:** Nouns games should AVOID play-to-earn cryptocurrency models. Gone wrong, they can do more damage to the Nouns brand than good. We don't plan on issuing a token or using play-to-earn tokenomics.

---

# Collabs
### Games play well with other Nouns projects ...
Decentralizing games across communities through collabs. This is big.

![Collabs](https://i.imgur.com/zkWUEuI.jpg)

# Future Proposals

Objective is to bring **ambitious gaming proposals** to NounsDAO, for example:

**Games Meets Toys**
Funding to connect games and toys, loading toys into games, AR features

**Collabs with other Nouns Projects**
Games x Nouns opens up new opportunities for Nouns communities

**Publishing Games to PC and Consoles**
Publish games for Mac, PC, Steam, Epic, and consoles (hello Nintendo)

**Game Dev Hackathons**
Funding for hackathons to create new prototypes and web games

**Scaling Up Nouns Proliferation with Games**
Onboarding people to Nouns with games, by scaling up successful advertising experiments. Proliferation on demand, to desired audiences, with measurable ROI.

---

# Outcome

### ‚úÖ Nouns Communities get Powered Up
Decentralized web games for Nouns communities unlock new business models

### ‚úÖ Nouns Solves its Game Funding Problem
Nouns Game Publisher helps NounsDAO make smart investments in games

### ‚úÖ Indie Game Developers Flock to Nouns
Game publishing pipeline and CC0 toolkit attracts new talent to Nouns

### ‚úÖ Games Get Less Expensive to Market
A network of Nouns games is less expensive to advertise. For example:
* Pay for 1 install, games link to 6 games, 7 installs for the price of 1
* Advertise a games website with 7 games, per-game ad costs reduced by 85%
* Proliferation efforts for **one** Nouns game helps elevate **all** Nouns games

### ‚úÖ NounsDAO Gets Quality Gaming Proposals ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®
When a new game proposal is brought to the DAO, a game should:
1. Be playable
2. Have base metrics
3. Show promising early results

Funding risk is lower, success is more likely. NounsDAO can **scale up successful games** to proliferate Nouns anywhere in the world.

# Nouns = Open Source Nintendo?
Mushrooms, bombs, stars, clouds ... they *already exist* as Nouns ü§Ø

[![Nounio Bros](https://i.imgur.com/Y625qy0.gif)](https://nounsgames.wtf)

**Play this prototype** (and more) at [**nounsgames.wtf**](https://nounsgames.wtf)

proposals.title: Expanding Global Distribution of Lo-Fi Noggles
proposals.description:
# Expanding Global Distribution of Lo-Fi Noggles

As a veteran manufacturer in the Nouns ecosystem, [NOUNWORKS](https://twitter.com/nounworks) has a proven pipeline for delivering quality products. We would like to place Noggles onto the faces of every Nounish person on the planet. We are requesting funding to create another run of Lo-Fi Noggles. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rkK1-Kqr3.jpg)
*25K+ Lo-Fi Noggles to supply large-scale IRL events*

# STEP 1: Decide who gets what

With this production run we plan on outfitting various active members of the global Nouns community so that their IRL events are even more Nounish. 

We will survey groups to understand their needs, and we will accept requests and inquiries from people writing props or planning events. 

**Note that this survey has already begun in the Discourse [here](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/worldwide-lo-fi-noggles-everey-where-reorder/4674) and many groups have already confirmed a strong interest in receiving shipments of the Lo-Fi Noggles:**

**Nouns Running:** *"As the founder of the Nouns Running Club, I can say that we REALLY need these. We had a small batch of 30 donated by another grantee, and they went like hotcakes. People really liked them and it was a good way for people to feel good after a run and they just GOT the good vibes."*

**Pizza DAO:** *"Was incredibly excited to be able to distribute these at our Global Pizza Event. Also, having them at our events offered another layer of experience for our party attendees by offering them as a ‚Äúprop-for-participation‚Äù (it was great for attendees to be able to jump in a photo or video and play ‚Äúpass the noggles,‚Äù etc‚Ä¶while meeting up for some pizza). Enjoy the energy this can bring to events all over! Would love to get a bunch for future events!"*

**Mucho Love:** *"Lo-Fi Noggles are more than just fun cardboard eyewear for Mucho Love. They serve as a tangible manifestation of the spirit and ethos of our organization. As we engage in our various activations, these Noggles serve as an icebreaker, a conversation starter, and a symbol of our commitment to spreading joy and positivity. They enhance our content‚Äôs recognizability, making it stand out and resonate with audiences familiar with Nouns. They are instrumental in fostering community, spreading our message, and enhancing the impact of our work.""*

**Serpunk:** *I think this is a good idea. A low budget option to nounify any event should exist and I believe this is it!*

**Nouns in Rio:** *"We definitely need those for Nouns in Rio/NounsBR events!*

**Nouns Amigos:** *"Noggles set the vibes for any IRL event! Definitely needed for Nouns Amigos community ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó®"*

**Gnars:** *"Be very keen to reserve 2500 pieces for Gnars and Art Haus related events!"*

**Nouns Whisky:** *"this is awesome! We could distribute 3000 of them."*



[MANY more positive reactions and support / requests for this prop here](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/worldwide-lo-fi-noggles-everey-where-reorder/4674/7).

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1r1Yuk_3.jpg)

# STEP 2: Produce more Lo-Fi paper Noggles 

Factory produces what we need to outfit Nounish groups worldwide (we are estimating 25K units). 

# STEP 3: Ship worldwide

Cases of Lo-Fi Noggles ship to Nounish groups directly from factory.

# STEP 4: Remaining units held in USA for future use

The rest of the production run (if there are any extras) will be shipped to our warehouse in USA to be allocated and distributed as needed.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SySXKByr2.jpg)

# Why do it this way? 

This plan avoids chaos and increases production and logistical efficiency. (End result: better and more accurately planned proliferation of Nouns on a global scale).

# This round of production:
These are the high quality cardboard versions of our classic Noggles design, but created in a flat packed / inexpensive format. Each pair comes packaged with an informative backer card and is easily shipped and distributed at events worldwide. 

This run will improve with heavier cardstack, a 2-sided full color backer card, and a polybag.

Lo-Fi Noggles come packed in 50-piece bundles and can be produced and shipped in very large quantities to Nounify even the biggest events. 


# Why 25K units?

We feel that 25K pieces is a small ask based on the popularity and the huge need for affordable and easily shipped Noggles around the world. 

We will survey Nouns community members to find out what quantities each of them may require for their upcoming activations.

Final quantity depends on requests from active Nouns community, event planners and creators.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJXUFuJOn.jpg)


# Who is slated to receive Lo-Fi Noggles?
Below is a list of some of the active communities that we are considering. They are scattered around the world and host / organize frequent IRL events: 

* [Esports](https://twitter.com/nounsesports): 3000-5000 pcs for ongoing local and global events
* [NOUNS RUNNING](https://twitter.com/NounsRC):  3000-5000 pcs for ongoing local and global events
* [Nouns Amigos](https://twitter.com/NounsDAOAmigos):   3000-5000 pcs for ongoing local and global events
* [NOUNS Africa](https://twitter.com/nounsDAOAfrica)
* [GNARS](https://twitter.com/gnars_dao): 3000 pcs for ongoing local and global events
* [Alps Dao](https://twitter.com/AlpsDAO) 
* [NOUNS WHISKEY](https://twitter.com/Nouns_Whisky): 3000 pcs for ongoing local and global events
* [Profwerder](https://twitter.com/ProfWerder): 1000 pcs for ongoing local events
* [NOUNS Brazil](https://twitter.com/nounsbr)
* [Nouns Latin America](https://twitter.com/NounsLatam)
* [NOUNS OTG](https://twitter.com/OTGWTF)
* [PIZZA DAO](https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO): 3000-5000 pcs for ongoing local and global events
* [Australian Open](https://twitter.com/AustralianOpen)
* [NFT Paris](https://twitter.com/nft_paris)
* [Nouns Deli](https://twitter.com/NounsDeli): 3000-5000 pcs for ongoing local and global events (USA to Australia shipping is very expensive so this one is great for the team)
* Free Glasses For Kids / Vision Van
* **If anyone else has a need for 1000+ pairs of Noggles for an activation, please DM us.**


# Improved unit cost:
$1.95 + shipping, minimum 25K units to achieve this pricing, no maximum order size. [Previous order](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/low-fi-nounish-noggles-by-bigshot/2103/59) costed $2.40/unit.

Worldwide shipping costs average to $350 per carton of 1000, and we'd make minimum of 25 cartons. 

# Total ask for 25K units:
$57,000 in USDC deposited into the Nounworks projects wallet:


[0xd25912007EBC2527d4ED9DC536f928E550b0f02C](https://etherscan.io/address/0xd25912007EBC2527d4ED9DC536f928E550b0f02C)

# Why now?
To ensure we can distribute the Noggles worldwide ASAP, we aim to place our order with the printer as soon as possible.


# After we ship to Nouns community members: 

Warehousing, administrative, and shipping fees TBD after the remainder gets to the USA, handled on a case by case basis. (See next prop which deals with ongoing funding for distribution of Nouns merch to members of the community).

In general once the unclaimed units get back to our USA warehouse, the cost to turn around and ship them again will be $2 per unit for the Lo-Fi Noggles and $2 more to ship them. They are in packs of 50 so that would be $200 shipped to get a pack of 50 back out to another country. That cost will be covered by the recipients or their props.

# Info about our previous order:
10K units were paid for by Nouns DAO (NSFW) and an additional 3K units were paid for by Bigshot. All have since been dispersed globally, sold out and gone. All faces wearing Lo-Fi Noggles were happy faces!

# So what's next?

Glad you asked. [We will have a follow-up prop that will fund our ongoing supply of our Nounish merch to members of the Nouns community worldwide](https://hackmd.io/@bigshot/BJSZdHJBh    ). This will complete the proliferation machine and will ensure a constant stream of Nounish merch to the doors of the right organizations. Let's go!
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJkXY_Jdh.jpg)

I like them better than the more sturdy plastic ones b/c it feels less wasteful in the mass marketing form (they are made of paper & very flat). so overall I'm very supportive of this prop and am voting FOR.

I do feel a bit concerned that a price point of FREE can lead to ppl over asking for these noggles (for example you realistically need only 500 but you ask 1000 b/c why not there's a small chance you might need more and it costs you nothing). So I would be a proponent of charging a small fee, let's say 10 cents per lo-fi noggle. Would love nounsworks team to think through this dynamic before the followup prop but again voting FOR for this.

proposals.title: NounsTennisFam (Feature Nouns/Noggles in grand slams/major tennis events and fund upcoming athletes)
proposals.description:
# NounsTennisFam (Feature Nouns/Noggles in grand slams/major tennis events and fund upcoming athletes)

# Objective and Overview

![](https://i.postimg.cc/W4qgnt8s/2.png)

**NounsTennisFam (NTF)** is a Web3 sports platform co-founded by ATP Rank 15 tennis player, Borna ƒÜoriƒá, and led by CEO Bruno Pliso. Forbes has recognized the platform for its innovative approach to revolutionizing the tennis industry. NTF is now ready to take the next steps in fostering the development of elite tennis talent, enhancing fan engagement, and positioning NounsDAO in front of a global audience of hundreds of millions.

To achieve these goals, NTF will harness its tennis stars as brand ambassador powerhouses. They will compete in custom NTF Noggles apparel at some of the world's biggest sporting events and actively promote NounsTennisFam through their impressive social media reach. Additionally, NTF will provide a fairer and more transparent on-chain infrastructure for developing elite tennis talent and democratizing the sport.

By supporting emerging players and enhancing fan engagement, NTF will make a mark on the industry, paving the way for a sustainable ecosystem for talent development, sponsorship opportunities, and interactive experiences. This will leave a legacy and transform NounsTennisFam into a well-known and respected name in the industry.

In line with NounsDAO's mission of decentralization and community-driven initiatives, NTF will offer a comprehensive suite of resources for professional and aspiring tennis players, including funding, training, and community support. Empowering pros, prospects, and fans and transforming them into a community of benefactors invested in one another's success is the future of sports. Together, let's change the game and establish NounsTennisFam as a major force in professional tennis.

# TL;DR

NounsTennisFam is set to revolutionize the tennis industry through blockchain technology and democratization of the sport by providing fair compensation for investors and talent. With the goal of becoming a cornerstone of the global tennis market valued at $5.6 billion, NounsTennisFam aims to represent athletes and connect fans under the NounsDAO banner in front of millions of fans worldwide.

## Key Objectives
![](https://i.postimg.cc/3Jn3LBfZ/3.png)
- Noggles and NounsTennisFam (NTF) branded jerseys to be worn by co-founder Borna Coric (World No 20 Croatian tennis star) in grand slams and other major events, with millions of views and discussions about Nouns and NTF in pre/post-match press conferences.
- Develop the "NounsTennisFam" platform to support up-and-coming athletes by funding them through the issuance of their own digital collectibles, which translates to a portion of the athletes' future game/endorsement earnings.
- Gain support from athletes such as Real Madrid/Croatian football star Luka Modric, Grand Slam winner Marin Cilic, and others in Borna's network.
- Provide branded NTF/Noggles competition apparel for all NTF-sponsored athletes, seen by millions.
- Support underprivileged communities to ensure that economics do not stand in the way of talent.
- Create new opportunities for fans to interact with sports, invest, and be a part of an athlete's journey from the beginning while learning about web 3 in the process.
- Establish NounsTennis Fam as a household name in professional sports.

This collaboration presents a tremendous opportunity for NounsDAO to gain incredible exposure before a global audience and create lasting value for the brand while supporting emerging prospects and established professionals in the tennis industry.

# Opportunity of a Lifetime

## Tennis Viewership Numbers Reveal the Sport's Widespread Appeal and Growing Popularity

Major tournaments, all of which NTF Co-founder, Borna competes in, attract millions of viewers worldwide. In 2021, Wimbledon reached a global audience of over 500 million viewers, while the French Open and the Australian Open had 350 million and 900 million viewers, respectively (source: Grand Slam Board). This global audience provides a significant opportunity for NounsTennisFam to engage a passionate user base and secure NounsDAO significant exposure before an army of loyal fans.

## Sports on the Blockchain

According to Grand View Research, Inc., the global sports market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 3.3% from 2020 to 2027, driven by increasing participation in sports, the rising popularity of sports leagues, and the growing demand for sports-related merchandise. Although this report does not specifically address tennis, a Nielsen Sports report forecasts tennis viewership to continue growing in the United States, fueled by top players' popularity and the rise of new stars like Coco Gauff. The US Open, in particular, has experienced significant growth, with a 33% increase in average audience per match in 2021 compared to the previous year. This suggests the potential for the sport to continue to grow in popularity and reach new audiences, offering a substantial opportunity for NounsDAO to engage with a large audience eager for innovative solutions like the NounsTennisFam platform.

## Success stories

### Tennis Australia

Tennis Australia collaborated with the Australian Open to incorporate blockchain technology and NFTs into the event. The final bounce of winning points was linked to corresponding NFTs known as "Artballs." Fans owning these NFTs won various rewards, such as tickets to the next year's tournament. The Australian Open also utilized the metaverse, creating a replica of the Rod Laver Arena in Decentraland and engaging with millions of users in a Roblox experience. These initiatives led to increased viewership and fan engagement, demonstrating the potential of blockchain technology in sports.

### NBA Top Shot

NBA Top Shot is a blockchain-based platform that allows fans to buy, sell, and trade officially licensed NBA collectible highlights (NFTs). Its success factors include a strategic partnership with the NBA, a user-friendly platform, and scarcity-driven value of collectibles.

### Socios.com

Socios.com is a blockchain-based fan engagement platform for sports teams. Its success factors include partnerships with top-tier football clubs, fan token offerings (FTOs), and voting rights for fans on certain club decisions.

These examples exhibit incredible potential for blockchain technology to revolutionize fan engagement, sports financing, and brand name recognition.

## Key Benefits of Collaboration

### Team and Experience

Boasting Ivy League graduates, professional athletes, proven entrepreneurs, and Web3 experts, the NounsTennisFam team is prepared to catapult NounsDAO into the professional tennis spotlight as a fresh, inventive, and distinguished new brand.

![](https://i.postimg.cc/mZzdHWfk/Screen-Shot-2023-06-07-at-1-04-23-am.png)

| [Co-founder Borna ƒÜoriƒá](https://www.atptour.com/en/players/borna-coric/cg80/overview) | [Co-founder & CCO Bruna ƒÜoriƒá](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bruna-%C4%87ori%C4%87-916784b5/) | [Co-founder & CEO Bruno Pliso](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bruno-pliso-1a29a6176/) | [Creative Director Nina Turudic](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nikolina-turudic-ab29b4b2/) |

| [Finance & Operations Ivan Turudic](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ivan-turudi%C4%87-18657a155/) | [CTO Karlo Brdek](https://www.linkedin.com/in/karlo-brdek) | [CMO Sven Stanko](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sven-stanko-545751ba/) | NFT Advisor, Dapper VP Fran Brajcic | [Web3 Consultant Shan Kumar](http://https://twitter.com/shanicucic96) |


# Platform Features and User Experience

![](https://i.postimg.cc/1RNDSMdm/platform.png)

NounsTennisFam platform offers a range of features designed to create a transparent, fair, and sustainable ecosystem to attract and connect tennis pros, new talent, and fans. 

1. **Platform & Launchpad:** The platform uses blockchain technology to establish a secure and transparent infrastructure to support emerging tennis talent. The NTF dApp enables fans to sponsor young and underprivileged players through funds generated by launchpad mints and commercial sponsorship deals. 
2. **Player Exclusive Launchpad & Drops**: This feature allows established players and potential professionals to tokenize a portion of their anticipated earnings, providing financial support. The platform offers two types of drops: Professional Drops (seasonal tokens) and Prospect Drops (sponsorship tokens), catering to different stages of a player‚Äôs career. 
3. **The Fam Section**: An exclusive content and social networking dashboard for NTF Asset holders, providing access to exclusive content, networking opportunities, and various benefits determined by the athletes. 
4. **Athletes & Valuation**: The platform features verified ATP and WTA players and up-and-coming prospects, with advisory and selection support from Borna‚Äôs management agency, Kozmos Holding. Drops are valued individually, with tokens representing a fraction of the total fractionalized prize money. Professional player valuations are based on historical performance data and a proprietary model, while prospect valuations involve negotiations and selection for either a Prospect pool or a Player exclusive drop, guided by the expertise of Kozmos Holding.

Together, NounsTennisFam and NounsDAO can actively support emerging tennis superstars by addressing one of their most significant challenges‚Äìfunding, while providing a framework for established professionals to enter the Web3 space through fractionalized earnings. This approach will strengthen our brand and further democratizes the sport of tennis. Additionally, this collaboration will place NounsTennisFam at the forefront of a vast global tennis market, valued at $5.6 billion in 2019 (Source: ITF). Notably, 46% of global tennis fans have a household income of $75,000 or more (Source: ITF), representing a demographic well-suited to become NounsDAO community members.

# Existing Partnerships and Collaborations

NounsTennisFam has already established integral strategic partnerships with tennis academies, professional players, sport management giants, and Web3 projects that enhance the platform‚Äôs features and user experience. Our collaborations within the tennis industry allow us to tap into the impressive viewership numbers of events, such as the Wimbledon 2019, with a peak audience of 9.6 million viewers in the UK alone (Source: BBC), and the French Open 2020 final, with a peak audience of 3.3 million viewers in France (Source: SportsPro). 

These partnerships provide credibility and enable NounsTennisFam to engage with tennis fans and connect with Web3 natives through our blockchain partners. By utilizing these alliances, we will expand our reach to tennis enthusiasts and the growing Web3 community, fostering a comprehensive and sustainable ecosystem for developing elite tennis talent and increasing fan engagement.

## Meet our Athletes

Professional supporters actively promoting the platform and its vision to their extensive fan bases, generating global awareness and support for the project.

- **Borna ƒÜoriƒá** (ATP Rank #20)
- **Luka Modriƒá** (Real Madrid)
- **Ajla Tomljanoviƒá** (WTA Rank #47)
- **Marin Cilic** (ATP Rank #22)
- **Ana Konjuh** (WTA Rank #145)
- **Marcelo Brozovic** (Midfielder, Inter Milan)
- **Filip Krajinovic** (ATP Rank #65)
- **Donna Vekic** (WTA Rank #32) 

## Web3 Collaborators

Our Web3 partnership will bring fans and players together and help make tennis successful on the blockchain. Find out more about our amazing network.

- **Nine Lives Lounge**
- **Project Godjira**
- **Ballman Project**
- **AO ArtBall**
- **The Apelist**
   **and more**

# Roadmap, Marketing, and Growth Plan

## Roadmap

- The platform development is scheduled to start in Q2 2023, with a beta launch planned for Q4 2023.
- The selection process for the talent program and the issuance of NFTs representing the prospects will start in Q4 2023.
- The team plans to provide regular updates to the NounsDAO community on the platform‚Äôs progress and milestones achieved.
- Signed prospect player and limited collection Q4 2023
- Sign established tennis pro and limited collection Q4 2023
- Community Event at the AO Q1 2024
- Community event at Meneghetti Wine Hotel and The Croatia Open
- Event & Exhibition at the Roland Garros Q3 2024

# Marketing and growth

![](https://i.postimg.cc/Z579BNGw/image-3.png)

## Phase 1: Awareness and Brand Building (Q2-Q3 2023)
- Increase brand awareness through social media campaigns, influencer partnerships, and collaborations with sports celebrities.
- Engage in PR efforts, including interviews, podcasts, and articles featuring key team members and ambassadors.
- Organize community events, AMAs, and live streams, creating a connection between fans, athletes, and the platform.
- Organise community tournaments and exhibition events during major tournaments.

## Phase 2: User Acquisition and Platform Adoption (Q4 2023-Q1 2024)
- Launch the NounsTennisFam platform and host the first drops, attracting users and investors.
- Create engaging content featuring platform users and success stories, highlighting the impact and opportunities provided by the platform.
- Collaborate with tennis academies, sports management agencies, and professional players to identify and support more talent, growing the user base and attracting more fans.

## Phase 3: Expansion and Ecosystem Growth (Q2 2024 and beyond)
- Explore partnerships with sports agencies, tennis organizations, and additional sports verticals to expand the platform‚Äôs reach.
- Develop additional features and enhance the platform‚Äôs user experience to retain users and encourage long-term engagement.
- Continuously expand the roster of players and prospects, attracting more users and increasing the platform‚Äôs credibility and impact on the tennis and Web3 ecosystem.

# Proposed Partnership

![](https://i.postimg.cc/t4xZ3DRh/Screen-Shot-2023-06-07-at-1-11-07-am.png)

The proposed partnership will allow us to engage a large audience eager for innovative solutions like the NounsTennisFam platform. By utilizing NounsDAO funding to further develop our platform, the partnership will establish a much-needed transparent and sustainable ecosystem for cultivating elite tennis talent, while increasing fan engagement and rewards. In turn, NounsTennisFam will be well situated to leverage current and future resources to proliferate NounsDAO with invaluable exposure through major sporting events, professional athletes, and far-reaching social accounts.

- Integrate the iconic Nouns glasses into the NTF logo, creating a unified brand identity.
- Showcase the NounsTennisFam logo on Borna ƒÜoriƒá's official Asics match jerseys for one calendar year, offering global exposure with one of tennis's rising stars during major sports events.
- Mandate all future NounsTennisFam athletes to wear the NounsDAO sleeve patch, further strengthening NounsDAO‚Äôs presence in the tennis world, and have them regularly share social media posts, contributing to the brand‚Äôs proliferation.
- Share stories of professionals and prospects involved with NounsTennisFam through social media, maximizing exposure and reaching new audiences.
- Leverage NounsTennisFam‚Äôs strong position in the sports industry to increase NounsDAO‚Äôs visibility as a supportive brand working to revolutionize tennis.
- Sign prospects and players in the NTF ecosystem to share NTF/Nouns content on their social profiles, extending NounsDAO‚Äôs reach to their audiences.
- Collaborate with AO Artball and pursue a wild card for the Australian Open for a prospect under NounsTennisFam sponsorship, further strengthening NounsDAO‚Äôs presence in the tennis world.
- Access an estimated tennis viewership of 971 million, offering a significant opportunity for NounsDAO to engage with a large audience eager for innovative solutions like NounsTennisFam platform.

# Proposed transaction

![](https://i.postimg.cc/WbZ30Z8h/Screen-Shot-2023-06-18-at-9-25-46-pm.png)

We are proposing a 200k payment to a multi-sig wallet controlled by 5 people including trusted Nouns holders/community members. It will be a 4 equal monthly payments which is to ensure that monthly progress is submitted to the multi signatories before the following month's payment.

Deliverables includes the following:

1. Sponsorship of World no 20 tennis player Borna coric displaying Noggles and Nouns to the entire world across 4 grand slams and other major tennis events via a Noggles patch on his shirt.

2. Development of a MVP (Minimum viable product) platform that allows public to participate in purchasing digital collectibles of up and coming Tennis players thereby funding their journey and receiving tangible and intangible benefits based on the purchaser's jurisdiction.

3. Spreading word about Nouns through top athlete social media, talks in international press conferences/interviews etc.

Upon completion of the above deliverables and completion on MVP, we will expand the platform while continuing with the same Nouns branding.

We have setup a multi-sig with trusted members of the Nouns community that will require 3 out of 5 of them to approve transactions.


Proposed payment dates and amount if the prop is approved:

June 30th 2023: 50,000$
July 30th 2023: 50,000$
Aug 30th 2023: 50,000$
Sep 30th 2023: 50,000$

The 5 multi-sig wallet signers are:
Bruno Pliso (https://www.linkedin.com/in/bruno-pliso-1a29a6176/) Co-Founder of NounsTennisFam
Shan Kumar (https://twitter.com/shanicucic96) Co-Founder of Project Godjira
87B0nes (https://twitter.com/87B0nes) Nouns holder and NounsDeli prop winner
0xigami (https://twitter.com/0xigami) Nouns holder and Founder of GnarsDao
Bixbite (https://twitter.com/BixbiteOfficial) LilNounsDAO Representative


# Trackable Success Metrics

- Number of users and NFT holders on the platform
- Expansion of current social media reach and engagement statistics
  - Twitter 7K Organic followers
  - Borna ƒÜoriƒá- Instagram 257K, Twitter 66K
  - ProTennisFam Partners & Collaborators- Over 10 Million on all platforms
  - PTF discord 1300 members
- Tennis tournaments wins and participation of NounsTennisFam athletes
- Performance and ranking improvements of the supported prospect player
- Community engagement levels in platform decisions and governance
- Number of brand Activations at major tennis tournaments, including Grand Slams.
- Record and report viewership numbers for upcoming tennis majors in which NounsTennisFam branded players participate.
- Steady increase in merchandise sales.

# Community Engagement and Participation

The NounsDAO community will be actively involved and engaged in the project through various means, such as voting on prospect player selection, providing input on platform features and improvements, and participating in governance decisions. The team will also provide regular community updates via an official newsletter, and performance reports on the supported prospects and the platform‚Äôs progress. Additionally, NounsDAO holders will have access to exclusive content, community events, and experiences, such as being able to attend tennis matches and meeting sponsored players.
![](https://i.postimg.cc/130gtj0S/business-newsletter-design-and-monthly-journal-design-free-vector.jpg)

# Risk Management and Long-term Sustainability

Anticipated challenges include market volatility, regulatory changes, and competition. These risks can be mitigated by implementing proven risk management strategies, maintaining open communication with the NounsDAO community, and diversifying partnerships and collaborations. By exploring the diverse set of revenue streams available within the global tennis market and tapping into the endorsement incomes of top tennis players, the partnership between NounsDAO and NounsTennisFam can achieve long-term financial sustainability and create lasting value for all stakeholders involved.

To further ensure the continued success and sustainability of the partnership, several strategies have been put in place to accommodate the unique needs and opportunities presented by the evolving tennis landscape and the Web3 ecosystem:

- Implement a revenue-sharing model that benefits investors, players, and the platform, with a portion of the platform‚Äôs earnings allocated for player development and platform improvements.
- Pursuing partnerships and collaborations with other Web3 projects and tennis organizations to expand our user base and increase revenue streams.
- Continue to engage and communicate with the NounsDAO community and other stakeholders to ensure that the platform meets their needs and expectations.
- Building a sustainable talent pipeline by supporting emerging players and reinvesting in their development.
- Regularly monitoring and assessing market trends and adjusting our strategies accordingly.

Through these strategies, we are confident that the partnership between NounsDAO and NounsTennisFam will achieve long-term financial sustainability, create lasting value, and continued familiarity within the industry.

# Conclusion

In conclusion, collaboration between NounsTennisFam and NounsDAO presents a significant opportunity to revolutionize the tennis industry through blockchain technology, democratize the sport, and introduce NounsDAO as a major brand and catalyst for positive change in professional sports.

By tapping into a global tennis market valued at $5.6 billion (source: ITF) and engaging with a passionate fanbase, this partnership is poised for success. The potential for audience engagement is evident in the 2022 US Open, where the third-round match between Serena Williams and Ajla Tomljanovich (Public Supporter of PTF) became the most-watched tennis telecast in ESPN‚Äôs 43-year history, with an average of 4.6 million viewers (ESPN Press Room, 2022). As tennis viewership continues to grow, the NounsTennisFam stands to benefit from increasing popularity within an immense, global audience of sports fans while building the NounsTennisFam brand. Together, we can positively impact the sport and its community, help shape the future, and gain significant brand recognition.
![](https://i.postimg.cc/J4NJD0mS/Nouns-Tennis-Fam.png)

proposals.title: NFT Yearbook Prop
proposals.description:
# NFT Yearbook Prop


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HyW-BwaVh.jpg)

## TLDR


Proposal for Funding from NOUNSDAO to Support the NFT Yearbook Project

The NFT Yearbook is a unique blend of a digital and physical artifact that boasts 420 pages and weighs 6.9 pounds. It is the largest democratically populated chronicling of the NFT space, and with the support of the NOUNSDAO, we aim to spread the word of web3, NOUNS, and cryptoart around the world, claiming our shared narrative and telling the story of web3 through the eyes of those building it.

The project has chronicled the web3 narrative from the very beginning to 2022, featuring contributions from over 550 artists, collectors, founders, creators, and community members through a democratic nomination process. The yearbook is a valuable resource for anyone interested in learning more about the history and future of web3.

We believe that NOUNSDAO is a perfect fit for supporting the NFT Yearbook project. The DAO is a community of dedicated web3 enthusiasts who are passionate about spreading the word about this new technology. With the DAO's support, we can reach a wider audience and make a greater impact.
  

In collaboration with NOUNSDAO, we propose:
a) Adding the NOUNS DAO logo, visuals, and content to all 3000 NFT Yearbooks.
b) Creating a limited edition NFT Yearbook with a custom NOUNS cover, to be airdropped to all NOUNS holders.
c) Printing and strategically placing 100 additional custom NOUNSDAO NFT Yearbooks around the world in strategic libraries / museums such as Harvard Business School, which has already collected 2 NFT Yearbooks for its libraries and permanent archives.

The total cost for this proposal is 88.6815 Œû

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B163wP6Eh.jpg)

## Introduction

The NFT Yearbook project has captured a snapshot of the rapidly evolving web3 landscape. It's a comprehensive 420-page, 6.9lbs coffee table book, and a 3D digital readable. It spotlights over 550 artists, collectors, founders, creators, and community members, including many NOUNS fam.
Link to participants list: https://twitter.com/i/lists/1559260935520411650 

Throughout the past year, we've accumulated over 750 hours of recorded interviews, encapsulating the web3 narrative from the perspectives of those actively shaping it.

A notable aspect of our project is its community-driven nature. The book was co-written and co-curated by the community. Each interviewee nominated other participants for the book, ensuring diversity, equality, and inclusivity.

We've also introduced a unique feature to increase engagement: blank content spaces as rarity traits. These spaces allow random NFT holders to contribute to the final version of the book, both digital and physical.


[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJHoroBDn.png)](https://player.vimeo.com/video/826545378)


*A 1/1 cover created by 0xDariush*

Being a 100% bootstrapped and small team, we've strived to ensure that all artists involved in the project can profit from their contributions by creating a 1:1 cover for the book, auctioned on SuperRare, with 100% of the profits returning to the artists.

In a month and a half, our [1/1 sales](https://superrare.com/series/0x1e3eac91085df57b4aa417b1471349d0bdb19152) have reached 58.150Œû. Moreover, three artists were invited to SuperRare thanks to the NFT Yearbook project. 79 artists participated in the 1/1 covers and our all-time high sale was 10ETH by thr33som3s.

Our main collection of NFT Yearbooks is hosted on OpenSea, and we've sold 1277 units out of the 3000 total, to date.

We're proud to announce that the NFT Yearbook was already collected by libraries at Harvard University/HBS, and the books will be placed in their permanent archives. This opportunity would place a NOUNS DAO limited edition cover yearbook in two of the most significant academic libraries globally, cementing its cultural significance.

With this proposal, we aim to increase the reach of the NOUNSDAO with the historically important content of the NFT Yearbook, to an additional 100 locations worldwide (famed libraries, galleries, etc.)= more NOUNS, everywhere!

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJcF8D6Nn.jpg)

## Project Details

The NFT Yearbook is a pioneering project that combines the physical and digital realms of art and literature. This 420-page coffee table book, weighing in at 6.9 lbs, captures the web3 narrative from the perspective of those who are actively building it. It is also available as a 3D digital readable yearbook, enhancing the experience of the readers.

Over 550 artists, collectors, founders, creators, and community members, many from NOUNSDAO, are featured in this comprehensive collection. The book is a testament to the vibrancy and diversity of the web3 community, serving as a historical record of the NFT space till 2022.

Our team has spent over 750 hours recording interviews, providing a wealth of insights and experiences. Additionally, each interviewee was given the opportunity to nominate other participants. This democratic approach to curation ensures that the final product is a true reflection of the community's diversity and inclusivity.

The NFT Yearbook is more than just a static record. It's a participatory project that invites engagement from its readers. A unique feature of the book is the opportunity for all holders to submit content for a blank space, making it a truly community-curated project.


![](https://nftyearbook.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Video_23-02-05_12-13-53-2.gif)

**The Team**
The book is created and published by Metaverse Publishing, a new bootstrapped web3 company lead by co-founders @CryptoForager81, (Sol Fayerman-Hansen) the ex-head of innovation at the Bank of Montreal and active in blockchain since 2014, and, @CryptoDashi (Dan Stern) who has 10 years of experience in e-Commerce entrepreneurship and DTC experiences creation.
Both have been degening since 2017. 
The third co-founder of Metaverse Publishing is a storied IRL coffee table book publisher with 30-years of experience and 300+ physical coffee table books produced, printed and shipped globally -Global Village Publishing.

**Metaverse Publishing**
The NFT Yearbook is our first step, our contribution to this space.
This unique web3 + in-house IRL publishing capability positions Metaverse Publishing to create some real dope sh*t, and it all starts with The NFT Yearbook.


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HyfUUwT4h.jpg)

## Market Validation

The NFT Yearbook project has already demonstrated its appeal and relevance within the community. In just a short span of time, we've managed to attract a passionate, dedicated community that actively participates in the project's development.

The project's notability extends beyond our community. The NFT Yearbook has been recognized by prestigious institutions, including Harvard University, which has included the yearbook in its library collection. This validation from such a renowned educational institution emphasizes the yearbook's cultural and academic significance.

The community's response has been overwhelmingly positive, with active engagement and enthusiasm for the project. NOUNS DAO members have been integral to the project, participating in decisions, suggesting ideas, and contributing content.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rySrovaEn.jpg)


## Goals and Milestones
Here are our specific goals and milestones:

1. **Finalize the book design with NOUNS DAO:** With the funding, we aim to finalize the design of the book, incorporating the NOUNS DAO community's feedback and ensuring the highest quality. The NFT Yearbook is complete outside of NOUNS DAO content.
   
2. **Production:** Upon design finalization, we'll move into production. Each NFT Yearbook comes in digital and physical form, each beautifully bound and printed to the highest standards.

3. **Distribution:** Once the yearbooks are printed, we will handle distribution. We aim to distribute the yearbooks to strategic libraries (two libraries at Harvard have already collected the book and will be placed in their permanent archives), institutions, and individuals around the world, thereby spreading the influence and reach of our community's creative output. For any NOUNS that do not wish to receive their physical books to their address (anons), they will have the option of allowing us to place their books wherever they would like them...schools, libraries, hotels, etc.

4. **Community Engagement:** As a key part of our mission, we will continue to engage our community in the development and refinement of the NFT Yearbook project. This includes seeking their input on design, content, and distribution strategies.

5. **Placing 100 Limited Edition NOUNS Cover Yearbooks In Strategic Libraries / Museums :** With the funding of this prop, Metaverse Publishing will print ( and create the NFTs ) of 100 NOUNS cover NFT Yearbooks and place them in Strategic libraries and institutions. We'll start with Harvard Business School which has already collected 2 NFT Yearbooks for its permanent libraries. We'll seek the community's support and recommendations to assist with this important mission. 

6. **Future Editions:** Securing this funding will help set the foundation for the production of future editions of the NFT Yearbook, ensuring that this becomes a tradition within our community, celebrating and documenting our achievements each year with NOUNS as a central figure in the future publications.

7. **NOUNS 3D books** The NFT Yearbook will revolutionize NOUNSDAO book projects (past and future) by transforming them into interactive 3D readable books that can be minted, have AR and VR capabilities, can be read in virtual worlds, etc. 

8. **Open-source / free tools** We will give all NOUNSDAO community first access to our open-source and free 3D book creation software, which empowers artists and authors to create immersive and interactive books, enabling them to bring their stories to life in a captivating three-dimensional environment.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ByUlBoSv3.png)](https://player.vimeo.com/video/826536881)


*The latest sample - the layout displayed is not final*

## The Impact
‚Üí Spreading the love: NOUNS will enter up to 3,075 new homes + 100 major, strategic public locations, worldwide.

‚Üí NOUNS and the NFT Yearbook go to Harvard Business School + 100 libraries / museums / galleries / schools...forever!
The NFTYB was collected by 2 libraries in Harvard Business School and once printed, will be placed in Baker Library and the main Harvard library on campus. Plus, we will reserve 10 additional units to be collected by future libraries/archives.

‚Üí Supporting the largest-ever chronicling of the space, and contributing to this historical project.

‚Üí Supporting an innovative bootstrapped web3 company, seeking to spearhead publishing 3.0 and empower the next gen of creators of web3.

‚Üí Create a new experience for past and future books supported by the DAO. We‚Äôre working on making all Metaverse Publishing books compatible in online galleries, VR and AR platforms, as well as metaverse platforms (for example, OnCyber).


## Project Timeline

NFT Yearbook Timeline:

Interviews: Completed prior to the timeline start.
Writing of the Book: Completed prior to the timeline start.
Public Sale: Completed prior to the timeline start.

Remaining Tasks:

**Completion of Community Content (May 2023):**
May 1-28, 2023: Gather and review community submissions (including NOUNSDAO).
May 16-25, 2023: Samples - Quality control checks and adjustments, if necessary.
May 28-31, 2023: Incorporate the community content into the book and prepare the finalized book layout for printing.

**Physical Printing of the Books (June/July 2023):**
June 1-30, 2023: Print the NFT Yearbook.

**Shipping (End of July 2023):**
July 3-16, 2023: Prepare for shipping, including packaging and labeling.
July 17, 2023: Open physical claim and begin shipping the NFT Yearbooks to customers.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1hTTPp43.jpg)


## Budget Breakdown

**The total budget for the NFT Yearbook project is 88.6815 ETH**

Here's how it will be allocated:

**Commission for NOUNS Limited Edition Cover:**
A total of 3 ETH will be allocated for commissioning an artist, voted by NOUNS Prop House to create three different versions of the limited edition cover.

**Production and Delivery of Books:** The rest of the funds, which total 88.6815 ETH, will be allocated to Metaverse Publishing for the production and delivery of the NFT Yearbooks. This allocation includes:
- Printing and placing an additional 100 NOUNS Cover NFT Yearbooks in strategic locations, worldwide, starting with Harvard Business School.
- Cost of producing the digital and physical versions of the NFT Yearbook with the limited edition NOUNS DAO cover.
- Cost of delivery, which includes worldwide shipping and taxes.
- The claim for the 6.9lbs physical coffee table book.

The allocation is based on the public mint price of the book (0.1195 ETH per book), multiplied by the total number of books (717 books).

The funds will be transferred to the Metaverse Publishing multisig Safe wallet.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJjV0w6Nh.jpg)


## Conclusion

The NFT Yearbook project is an innovative initiative to preserve and celebrate the vibrant, diverse, and rapidly evolving web3 community. By incorporating NOUNS DAO into this historical chronicle and funding the placement of 100 books in strategic libraries around the world, we are not only recognizing the significant role of the DAO and its members in shaping the web3 landscape, but we are also furthering our commitment to diversity, equality, inclusivity and building a community driven narrative of the amazing world of web3.

The proposed budget of 88.6815 ETH will enable the production and delivery of a limited edition NFT Yearbook featuring a unique NOUNS DAO cover, both in digital and physical formats and placing an additional 100 NOUNS NFT Yearbooks in strategic locations around the world. This endeavor will help NOUNS DAO to have a tangible and lasting impact, reaching up to 3,075 new homes worldwide, and even prestigious institutions like Harvard Business School.

By supporting this project, NOUNS DAO will contribute to an important historical project, while also paving the way for the future of publishing in the web3 space. The NFT Yearbook not only represents a snapshot of the current state of the NFT community, but it also serves as a vision of what the community can accomplish in the future.

We appreciate your consideration of this proposal and look forward to the opportunity of working with NOUNS DAO on this significant project.

proposals.title: Nounish Animations for Kids on YouTube Channel
proposals.description:
# Nounish Animations for Kids on YouTube Channel

We propose to create a YouTube channel that features Nounish musical animations for kids. Through musical animations about colors, the alphabet, numbers, shapes, and such, the channel will be a source of entertainment and also education for kids and will provide an opportunity for parents to introduce their children to the concept of Nouns.

Like this . üëá üÖ±Ô∏èüÖ∞Ô∏èüÖ∞Ô∏è üÖ±Ô∏èüÖ∞Ô∏èüÖ∞Ô∏è ‚¨õüêë üëá

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkOx10gvh.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z-ovG5ANUhA)


---
**Goals:** ‚≠ê

Create a library of Nounish animations that are fun and engaging for kids.
Build an audience of children and parents who are interested in Nouns.
Promote the use of Nouns as a tool for creativity and learning.
Strengthen the Nouns brand and increase its visibility.
Generate revenue through ad monetization and merchandise sales.
[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rkWbkAlvn.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1JT3CCNuoZQ)


---
**Approach:** 

* These animations will be musical in nature and accompanied by a voiceover that sings songs and such, featuring catchy tunes and colorful visuals that will capture the attention of young viewers.
* The animations will be short and feature Nouns in different scenarios.
* We will upload new animations to the YouTube channel on a regular basis.
* We will promote the channel through social media and online advertising.
* We will create Nounish animations using 3D modeling, animation software, and Unreal Engine 5. 
* All funding raised through the Nouns DAO for this project will be spent on producing high-quality animations and promoting the channel until it reaches monetization. After that point, the channel will be self-sustaining and able to reinvest revenue into creating even more engaging and educational content for young viewers.
* The channel revenue will be reinvested into the channel itself, with the funds going towards promoting the channel and creating more high-quality Nounish animations for kids to enjoy.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryxdk0xP2.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kiEZaKniJQk)


---
**Advantages for Nouns DAO:**

* The Nounish Animations for Kids YouTube channel will create a new avenue for promoting the use of Nouns.
* The channel will be an educational resource for children and parents, helping to build a new generation of Noun enthusiasts.
* The animations will help to create a stronger Nouns brand and increase its visibility in the marketplace.
* The project will help to diversify the Nouns ecosystem by creating a new type of content that appeals to a different audience.


---
**Video Views in the Past 4 Weeks**
---

We are thrilled to share the impressive number of video views we have received in the past 4 weeks, especially considering that our channel is newly established. The level of engagement and support we have received is truly remarkable.

In just **4 weeks**, our videos have collectively amassed over **40K** views. This level of viewership for a new channel is a testament to the quality and appeal of our content.

Interestingly, our video titled **ABC Song üÖ∞Ô∏è üÖ±Ô∏è ‚åê‚ó®-‚ó® For Kids!** has received the highest number of views during this period, surpassing **15K** . This indicates that our audience has shown great interest in Nounish content and topics covered in this particular video.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hykv1Agvn.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kle9tGyxWUw)


We believe this strong viewership reflects the value and impact of our videos on the target audience. It motivates us to continue producing engaging and educational content that resonates with viewers of all ages.

**Engaging Statistics and Figures** üéûÔ∏èüé¨üé•
---


During the first month of channel activity, we have achieved remarkable growth and engagement. Let the numbers speak for themselves:

Video Production: We have published **4 engaging videos** within this one-month period, captivating our audience with diverse and engaging content.

Impressive Views: Our very first video reached an impressive milestone of **15,000** views after only **4 weeks**, demonstrating the immediate impact of our content. Furthermore, our latest video achieved over **2,500 views** within the first day of its release.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJP02l7Dn.png)


Gaining Unique Viewers: With a total of over **40,000 unique views**, we have successfully captured the attention of a wide audience and established our channel as a go-to destination for quality content.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJrbuONvh.png)

Impressions and Reach: In the inaugural month, our channel garnered more than **660K impressions** on YouTube, showcasing the broad reach and visibility we have achieved.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJ0g93Vv2.png)

Engaging Parents: 62% of parents who share our videos with their children are female, while 37% are male. 
International Reach: Our channel has attracted viewers from various countries, including the United States , India , the Philippines , Brazil , and Vietnam . This global reach further amplifies our potential for growth and impact.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1tVWAlwn.png)

Impressive Watch Time: Within the first month, we have accumulated an impressive total watch time of **420 hours**, indicating the captivating nature of our videos and the engagement they generate.

These compelling statistics and figures showcase the immediate success and potential of our channel. They highlight the substantial growth in viewership, engagement, and global reach we have achieved within a short span of time. With this strong foundation, we are poised for even greater success in the future.


---


**Experience and Qualifications:**

My name is¬†[Arash](https://twitter.com/arashslacker?s=21&t=Pyl1UEvScSEsJs4S0w-2bQ), I am a video game and animation creator. Here's some of the work I have done:

- [Lil Nouns Music Video](https://twitter.com/ArashSlacker/status/1603321209613127680?s=20&t=7reei4hWvrg9tCth14J7MA)¬†funded by Lil Nouns'¬†[Content Pod](https://discord.com/channels/954142017556979752/1016388331602460773);
- [Put Your Noggles On](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HnNIvVETNvY) Music video.
- this¬†[Shrimpy Noun in a Burger](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5e-3rIzsQWw)¬†animation video;
- this¬†[I'm The Bomb animation video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQjWXc2EHQk);
- or this¬†[Nounish GIPHY channel](https://giphy.com/channel/ArashNegahban/nounish)¬†hosting a growing set of Nounish GIFs;
- additionally, if you take a look at¬†[my Twitter media](https://twitter.com/ArashSlacker/media), you will find even more Nounish animation content I have made in the past six months.

I have extensive experience in creating animated musical and cute videos, and I'm confident that I can produce engaging content that will attract and entertain my audience. With my expertise in animation, modeling, music production, and singing, I'm well-equipped to deliver high-quality videos that are both visually stunning and sonically appealing. I understand what it takes to create a successful YouTube channel, and I'm excited to take on this challenge and grow my channel by consistently publishing new and exciting content. I'm passionate about creating animations that evoke emotion and connect with viewers, and I believe that my unique skills and creative vision can help me achieve this goal. I look forward to sharing my work with the world and building a community of fans and supporters.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1NQNRgv2.png)](https://www.youtube.com/@NounishKids/videos)

---

**Budget:**


Publish one animated educational music video every 7 days, which amounts to **4 videos per month**.

Each video will be **1:30-5** minutes long and aimed at children.

The cost of each episode is estimated at **4000$** on average for each video.

To keep the channel going, it needs to be monetized and generate enough revenue to cover the cost of producing new videos and become self-sustainable. We estimate that we need **15 videos** to monetize the channel and should achieve self sustainability within **4 months**.

Total costs: **60,000 USDC**

---
